original: dman pa ni sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dman pa ni sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The inferior are those who are suffering.

original: snying brtse bar bya bas ni bkren pa nor 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: snying brtse bar bya bas ni bkren pa nor 'dod pa'o //
translated: Those who are worthy of compassion are the poor who desire wealth.

original: bdag nyid gcig pu so sor sangs rgyas pas na rang sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: bdag nyid gcig pu so sor sangs rgyas pas na rang sangs rgyas so //
translated: They are pratyekabuddhas because they attain buddhahood for themselves alone.

original: bas mtha'i gnas mal la tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni dben pa'i gnas bsten par ro //
analyzed: bas mtha'i gnas mal la tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni dben pa'i gnas bsten par ro //
translated: They are called ‚Äúthose who live in separate places‚Äù because they live in isolated places.

original: sbyin gnas gcig pu zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis cig car mi 'byung ba bzhin du bse ru dang 'dra bar rang sangs rgyas gcig pu kho na 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sbyin gnas gcig pu zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis cig car mi 'byung ba bzhin du bse ru dang 'dra bar rang sangs rgyas gcig pu kho na 'byung ba'o //
translated: They are the ‚Äúsole object of generosity‚Äù because, just as two buddhas do not appear in the world simultaneously, so also only one rhinoceros-like pratyekabuddha appears.

original: gzugs mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni lus kyi sgo nas rab tu dang bskyed par byed @39b pa ste ;
analyzed: gzugs mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni lus kyi sgo nas rab tu dang bskyed par byed @39b pa ste ;
translated: They are ‚Äúbeautiful in form‚Äù because they generate faith through their bodies.

original: lus la sogs pa'i bya ba shin tu zhi ba nyid kyi sgo nas sems rab tu dang ba skyed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i bya ba shin tu zhi ba nyid kyi sgo nas sems rab tu dang ba skyed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: It is inferred that they generate faith in the minds of others through their extremely peaceful bodily actions and so on.

original: rtsa ba nas bcad pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba nges par bcad pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba nas bcad pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba nges par bcad pa'o //
translated: They are ‚Äúcut off at the root‚Äù because they have severed the root.

original: rtsub pa ni shin tu drag pa'o //
analyzed: rtsub pa ni shin tu drag pa'o //
translated: Rough means very strong.

original: khyu mchog gi tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'di la khyu mchog gi yin pas na khyu mchog gi ste /
analyzed: khyu mchog gi tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'di la khyu mchog gi yin pas na khyu mchog gi ste /
translated: With the words of a bull, etc. means that since he is a bull, he is a bull.

original: 'jigs pa med pa'i dag go //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa'i dag go //
translated: He is fearless.

original: gcig tu chad par byas te zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar bya bar dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu chad par byas te zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar bya bar dam bcas pa'o //
translated: Having made a single vow means having made an irrevocable promise.

original: 'khor te skye bo mang po tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor te skye bo mang po tshogs pa'o //
translated: An assembly is a gathering of many people.

original: seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa ni seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa ni seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o //
translated: Having roared the lion's roar means having roared like a lion.

original: gsad par bya ba ni srog dang dbral bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsad par bya ba ni srog dang dbral bar bya ba'o //
translated: What is to be killed is what is to be deprived of life.

original: bya ba ni thag nye bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni thag nye bar gyur pa'o //
translated: An action is something that has become proximate.

original: byed pa ni dus kyis chod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni dus kyis chod par gyur pa'o //
translated: An agent is something that has become separated by time.

original: go cha bskon pa ni go bgos pa'o //
analyzed: go cha bskon pa ni go bgos pa'o //
translated: Armoring is putting on armor.

original: shing ka ko ta ka shun pa bshus par ri can zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shing ka ko ta ka shun pa bshus par ri can zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having stripped the bark from the kakatunda tree, etc. means

original: phyogs dang phyogs las shun pa gogs par gyur pa'i phyir shun pa bshus pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs las shun pa gogs par gyur pa'i phyir shun pa bshus pa'o //
translated: that the bark has been stripped because it has been stripped from all directions.

original: gnas dang gnas su shun pa skams shing rnyings pa ni phra bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ra ri can te /
analyzed: gnas dang gnas su shun pa skams shing rnyings pa ni phra bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ra ri can te /
translated: The bark of the tree in the various places is dry and old, because it is thin.

original: shun pa gzugs mi sdug par gyur pa ni ra ri can yin no zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shun pa gzugs mi sdug par gyur pa ni ra ri can yin no zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bark is ugly in form, because it is taken as the basis.

original: lhag ma tsam chung la srab pa ni lo ma nyung la srab pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma tsam chung la srab pa ni lo ma nyung la srab pa'o //
translated: The remaining parts are small and thin, because the leaves are few and thin.

original: lo ma srab pa nyid kyi phyir grib ma chung ba'o //
analyzed: lo ma srab pa nyid kyi phyir grib ma chung ba'o //
translated: The shade is small, because the leaves are thin.

original: byams pa ni dgyes pa'o ;
analyzed: byams pa ni dgyes pa'o ;
translated: Affection is joy.

original: / thugs brtse ba ni rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa'o //üîΩphru ma btab pa ni dmag gi bkod pa byas nas so //
analyzed: / thugs brtse ba ni rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa'o // phru ma btab pa ni dmag gi bkod pa byas nas so //
translated: Compassion is sympathy.

original: bskor ba ni steng nas g-yogs par 'dod pa'o //üîΩ'jig rten ni las bdag gir byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten gyi las bdag po yin pa de'i phyir las bdag gir byed pa'o //
analyzed: bskor ba ni steng nas g-yogs par 'dod pa'o // 'jig rten ni las bdag gir byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten gyi las bdag po yin pa de'i phyir las bdag gir byed pa'o //
translated: Having set up the troops, he surrounds them, wishing to cover them from above.üîΩThe world is the owner of karma, etc. The world is the owner of karma, therefore it is the owner of karma.

original: 'jig rten gyi las skyed par byed pa'i gnas yin pa de bas na las las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi las skyed par byed pa'i gnas yin pa de bas na las las skyes pa'o //
translated: The world is the place that produces karma, therefore it is born from karma.

original: rang nyid kyis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang nyid kyis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because one experiences the results of actions that one has done oneself,

original: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o //
translated: one experiences the results of one‚Äôs actions.

original: rang gis byas pa'i las la nye bar brten nas 'jug pa'i phyir las la brten pa'o //
analyzed: rang gis byas pa'i las la nye bar brten nas 'jug pa'i phyir las la brten pa'o //
translated: Because one engages in action based on one‚Äôs own actions, one is dependent on action.

original: las de myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni las byas shing bsags pa'i 'bras bu la gcig tu nye bar spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las de myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni las byas shing bsags pa'i 'bras bu la gcig tu nye bar spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOne experiences the results of one‚Äôs actions‚Äù means that one experiences the results of actions that one has done and accumulated.

original: gzhu rgyud ni 'dren pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhu rgyud ni 'dren pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The bowstring is the means of drawing.

original: nan thag ces bya ba ni rta la sogs pa'i go cha 'ching bar byed pa'o //üîΩ'breng ba zhes bya ba @40a * //
analyzed: nan thag ces bya ba ni rta la sogs pa'i go cha 'ching bar byed pa'o // 'breng ba zhes bya ba @40a * //
translated: The rope is that with which one ties the harness of horses, etc.üîΩThe rein is that with which one guides a single horse.

original: ni glang po dag gi 'breng thag go //
analyzed: ni glang po dag gi 'breng thag go //
translated: The elephant goad is that with which one guides an elephant.

original: rna ba'i g-yogs ma ni rna ba'i bug pa rgyan dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i g-yogs ma ni rna ba'i bug pa rgyan dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The ear ornament is the opening of the ear together with the ornament.

original: go cha bshig nas zhes bya ba ni go cha du ma bur byas nas so //
analyzed: go cha bshig nas zhes bya ba ni go cha du ma bur byas nas so //
translated: Having unfastened the armor means having taken off the many pieces of armor.

original: las kyi mtha' zhes bya ba ni 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
analyzed: las kyi mtha' zhes bya ba ni 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
translated: The end of action refers to the end of the action of rice, etc.

original: brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Great effort and so on.

original: brtson 'grus ni yid kyi spro ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni yid kyi spro ba'o //
translated: Effort is mental enthusiasm.

original: stobs ni lus kyi'o //
analyzed: stobs ni lus kyi'o //
translated: Strength is physical.

original: pha rol gnon pa ni bya ba byed nus pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol gnon pa ni bya ba byed nus pa'o //
translated: Heroism is the ability to perform actions.

original: 'ongs pa ni nye bar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'ongs pa ni nye bar phyin pa'o //
translated: Arrival is close approach.

original: ya mtshan du gyur pa ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ya mtshan du gyur pa ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
translated: Wondrous is marvelous.

original: ngo mtshar gyis de dag gi mig bgrad pas na mig gdangs pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar gyis de dag gi mig bgrad pas na mig gdangs pa'o //
translated: Astonished, their eyes opened wide.

original: kho bo ni de'i bang chen te zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i rjes su phan 'dogs pa'i mchog gis sbyor bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kho bo ni de'i bang chen te zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i rjes su phan 'dogs pa'i mchog gis sbyor bar gyur pa'o //
translated: I am his messenger means I have become engaged in the supreme benefit of following him.

original: dgon pa bsrung bar byos shig ces bya ba ni ri dags gsod pa'i gnas shing gi rib mas kun nas bskor ba'i ri dags 'jug pa'i sa phyogs shig nas byas pa'o //
analyzed: dgon pa bsrung bar byos shig ces bya ba ni ri dags gsod pa'i gnas shing gi rib mas kun nas bskor ba'i ri dags 'jug pa'i sa phyogs shig nas byas pa'o //
translated: Protect the forest means from a certain place where deer enter, surrounded by a fence of trees, the place of killing deer.

original: ngag 'jam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ngag 'jam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Gentle speech and so on.

original: ngag 'jam pa ste /
analyzed: ngag 'jam pa ste /
translated: Gentle speech is gentle.

original: ngang 'jig rten gyi 'jam pa zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ngang 'jig rten gyi 'jam pa zhes brjod pa'o //
translated: It is called worldly gentleness.

original: sbyin pa ni rjes su sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni rjes su sbyin pa'o //
translated: Giving is subsequent giving.

original: tshig gi ngor sngon du song ba can ni 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gi ngor sngon du song ba can ni 'byed pa'o //
translated: The division is based on the prior existence of the words.

original: kun du spyod pa ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa ni rigs pa'o //
translated: The practice is the reasoning.

original: gal te bstan ma thag pas don sgrub pa ma grub par gyur pa de'i tshe gser la sogs pa'i chad pa 'dir rigs yin te /
analyzed: gal te bstan ma thag pas don sgrub pa ma grub par gyur pa de'i tshe gser la sogs pa'i chad pa 'dir rigs yin te /
translated: If the meaning is not established by the immediately preceding [reasoning], then this punishment of gold, etc. is appropriate.

original: chad pa dbab pa'i sgo nas don bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: chad pa dbab pa'i sgo nas don bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is to be established by way of punishment.

original: stobs ni glang po che la sogs par sgrub par byed pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: stobs ni glang po che la sogs par sgrub par byed pa'i bye brag go //
translated: The power is the specific accomplishment of elephants, etc.

original: byas te zhes bya ba ni bsgrubs te'o //
analyzed: byas te zhes bya ba ni bsgrubs te'o //
translated: Having done is having accomplished.

original: thob nas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su mthar phyin nas so //
analyzed: thob nas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su mthar phyin nas so //
translated: Having obtained is having fully completed in every way.

original: dga' na zhes bya ba ni 'dod na'o //
analyzed: dga' na zhes bya ba ni 'dod na'o //
translated: If one wishes is if one desires.

original: lta ba ni thog mar spyod pa'o /
analyzed: lta ba ni thog mar spyod pa'o /
translated: The view is the initial practice.

original: btsal ba ni rgyun gyis gtsod pa'o //
analyzed: btsal ba ni rgyun gyis gtsod pa'o //
translated: The search is the continuous pursuit.

original: brtson pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba ni sh'akya gsod pa la brtson pas mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: brtson pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba ni sh'akya gsod pa la brtson pas mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa'o //
translated: The weapon of striving is the raising of weapons by those striving to kill the ≈öƒÅkyas.

original: ma'i pha ni 'dir mes po'o //
analyzed: ma'i pha ni 'dir mes po'o //
translated: The father of the mother is the grandfather here.

original: tshogs pa ni 'dus pa yin la /
analyzed: tshogs pa ni 'dus pa yin la /
translated: The assembly is the gathering.

original: tshogs kyi phyir rab tu smin pa ni las mthun par byas pa ste /
analyzed: tshogs kyi phyir rab tu smin pa ni las mthun par byas pa ste /
translated: The ripening for the sake of the assembly is the action of the concordant effect.

original: tshogs kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the phrase is that the action is experienced as the result of the assembly.

original: mal la ba hi ni ri brag gi bye brag go //
analyzed: mal la ba hi ni ri brag gi bye brag go //
translated: A bed is a particular kind of mountain.

original: grong gi rtsig pa dang rib ma yongs su bskor ba'i khyim gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: grong gi rtsig pa dang rib ma yongs su bskor ba'i khyim gyi tshogs so //
translated: A village is a collection of houses surrounded by walls and fences.

original: grong rdal ni yul 'khor te rgyal khams kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: grong rdal ni yul 'khor te rgyal khams kyi khyad par ro //
translated: A town is a district, a particular region.

original: rgyal @40b po'i pho brang ni rgyal po'i khab kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i grong khyer ro //üîΩae ma ho sh'a kya ni bsregs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /üîΩrjes su brtse bas lan gnyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal @40b po'i pho brang ni rgyal po'i khab kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i grong khyer ro // ae ma ho sh'a kya ni bsregs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni / rjes su brtse bas lan gnyis brjod pa'o //
translated: A royal palace is a city marked by a royal residence.üîΩThe phrase ‚ÄúAlas, the ≈öƒÅkyas are being burned!‚Äù is a second expression of compassion.

original: dong brkos la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dong brkos la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase ‚ÄúDig a trench!‚Äù and so on is a third expression of compassion.

original: sh'akya'i gzhon nu ji snyed pa dong de snyed pa kho na brkos nas sh'a kya'i gzhon nu dong re rer bcug pa re re'i steng du lcags las byas pa'i glang po che'i rkang pa'i rnam pa lta bus g-yogs par bya zhing de'i 'og tu glang po che'i brdzis
analyzed: sh'akya'i gzhon nu ji snyed pa dong de snyed pa kho na brkos nas sh'a kya'i gzhon nu dong re rer bcug pa re re'i steng du lcags las byas pa'i glang po che'i rkang pa'i rnam pa lta bus g-yogs par bya zhing de'i 'og tu glang po che'i brdzis
translated: As many ≈öƒÅkya youths as there are pits, just that many ≈öƒÅkya youths are to be placed in each pit, and each one is to be covered with something made of iron like the foot of an elephant.

original: na glang po che'i rang pa lcags kyi rkang pa lta bus bsdigs pa las de dag phye mar brlag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: na glang po che'i rang pa lcags kyi rkang pa lta bus bsdigs pa las de dag phye mar brlag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when the elephants trample below, they will be crushed to dust by the iron feet of the elephants.

original: yang na lcags las byas pa'i bshal spyad lcags kyi rkang pa lta bu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang na lcags las byas pa'i bshal spyad lcags kyi rkang pa lta bu zhes bya'o //
translated: Or, it is said that the iron feet are like the feet of an iron plow.

original: du ba 'thul bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni du ba 'byin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: du ba 'thul bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni du ba 'byin par byed pa'o //
translated: It is said it smokes because it emits smoke.

original: tsi ri ri zer nas bya ba ni tsi ri ri sgra cung zad sgrog pa'o //
analyzed: tsi ri ri zer nas bya ba ni tsi ri ri sgra cung zad sgrog pa'o //
translated: It is said it crackles because it makes a slight crackling sound.

original: sgra yang 'byin to zhes bya ba ni sgra shin tu che ba sgrog pa'o //
analyzed: sgra yang 'byin to zhes bya ba ni sgra shin tu che ba sgrog pa'o //
translated: It is said it roars because it makes a very loud sound.

original: phrin las rnam par smin pa ni phrin las gyur pa ste /
analyzed: phrin las rnam par smin pa ni phrin las gyur pa ste /
translated: The action that ripens is the action that has occurred.

original: phrin las kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩrus mtshungs pa ni rus dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: phrin las kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // rus mtshungs pa ni rus dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúaspect of activity‚Äù is the same.üîΩ‚ÄúHaving the same clan‚Äù means having a clan.

original: drang srong dro na'i rigs dang bcas pa ni rus dro nar bcas pa'o //
analyzed: drang srong dro na'i rigs dang bcas pa ni rus dro nar bcas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the Dro·πáa clan‚Äù means having the Dro·πáa clan.

original: rang bzhin gyi nyes pas ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir nyes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi nyes pas ma gos pa nyid kyi phyir nyes pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout fault‚Äù means not being tainted by faults by nature.

original: gnod pa med pa ni zhes bya ba ni gnod pa byas pa med par ro ;
analyzed: gnod pa med pa ni zhes bya ba ni gnod pa byas pa med par ro ;
translated: ‚ÄúWithout harm‚Äù means without doing harm.

original: / nyam thag pa'i skad ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams kyi ha ha'i sgra mthon po'o //
analyzed: / nyam thag pa'i skad ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams kyi ha ha'i sgra mthon po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúA cry of distress‚Äù is a loud cry of ‚Äúha ha‚Äù by those who are afflicted by suffering.

original: khyad par ram zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mngon sum gyis yongs su gcad par bya ba'i bye brag ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyad par ram zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mngon sum gyis yongs su gcad par bya ba'i bye brag ni khyad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúDistinction‚Äù and so on. The distinction that is to be discerned by direct perception is a particular.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pas yongs su gcad par bya ba ni bsam pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pas yongs su gcad par bya ba ni bsam pa'o //
translated: The thought that is to be discerned by inferential cognition is an idea.

original: byed pa sna tshogs gsal ba'i tshul gyis rnam pa gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: byed pa sna tshogs gsal ba'i tshul gyis rnam pa gzhan nyid do //
translated: The other mode is the manifestation of various actions.

original: shan pa ni phyugs gsod pa'o //
analyzed: shan pa ni phyugs gsod pa'o //
translated: A butcher is one who kills cattle.

original: mngon par bsgrubs te zhes bya ba ni grub par gyur na'o //
analyzed: mngon par bsgrubs te zhes bya ba ni grub par gyur na'o //
translated: Having accomplished them means having attained them.

original: spyod par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni skyong bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: spyod par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni skyong bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Having practiced them means having maintained them.

original: khyim bya gsod par byed pas na khyim bya gsod pa'o //
analyzed: khyim bya gsod par byed pas na khyim bya gsod pa'o //
translated: A poultry butcher is one who kills chickens.

original: de bzhin du phag gsod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du phag gsod pa yang ngo //
translated: Similarly, a pig butcher is one who kills pigs.

original: bya ba zhes bya ba ni bya 'dzin pas na 'tsho bar byed pa'i thabs can no //
analyzed: bya ba zhes bya ba ni bya 'dzin pas na 'tsho bar byed pa'i thabs can no //
translated: A hunter is one who makes a living by catching birds.

original: rgya ni ri bong 'dzin par byed pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: rgya ni ri bong 'dzin par byed pa'i thabs te /
translated: A trapper is one who sets traps for rabbits.

original: des bya ba byed pa'i phyir ri bong la rgyas 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: des bya ba byed pa'i phyir ri bong la rgyas 'debs pa'o //
translated: Because he makes his living by that, he is called a trapper.

original: slob pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis phog pa gyur pa zhes bya ba ni slob pa'i gang zag rnams la mngon par @41a * //
analyzed: slob pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis phog pa gyur pa zhes bya ba ni slob pa'i gang zag rnams la mngon par @41a * //
translated: One who is struck by the splendor of those in training means one who is struck by the splendor of those in training.

original: dad pa'i lhas tshig rtsub pa pos brdegs pa 'am /
analyzed: dad pa'i lhas tshig rtsub pa pos brdegs pa 'am /
translated: Because of his lack of faith in those in training, he speaks harshly to them.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i khong khro ba ma spangs pa'i phyir slob pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis phog par gyur pa ni tshig rtsub po yongs su brjod pa 'am /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i khong khro ba ma spangs pa'i phyir slob pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis phog par gyur pa ni tshig rtsub po yongs su brjod pa 'am /
translated: Because he has not abandoned anger to be abandoned by the path of meditation, he speaks harshly to those in training who are struck by his splendor.

original: slob pa du ma bsad par gyur pa las sdig pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas slob pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis phog par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: slob pa du ma bsad par gyur pa las sdig pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas slob pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis phog par gyur pa'o //
translated: He was struck by the splendor of the students.üîΩLike one who is looked at by a snake,

original: sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sbrul mthong ba'i dug can gyis bltas pa ste /
analyzed: sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sbrul mthong ba'i dug can gyis bltas pa ste /
translated: just as one who is looked at by a poisonous snake is struck by the poison of his look,

original: mthong bas rigs thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ko sa la'i rigs brgyud med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong bas rigs thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ko sa la'i rigs brgyud med par 'gyur ro //
translated: in the same way, the Kaurava lineage was destroyed.

original: nya pa ni nya gsod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nya pa ni nya gsod par byed pa'o //
translated: A fisherman is one who kills fish.üîΩHaving been cut and cut again,üîΩhaving been cut and cut again,

original: gcad cing gcad cing zhes bya ba ni zlos pa'i tshig gnyis yin la /
analyzed: gcad cing gcad cing zhes bya ba ni zlos pa'i tshig gnyis yin la /
translated: is a double repetition.

original: bcad pa ni gtubs pa'o //
analyzed: bcad pa ni gtubs pa'o //
translated: Having been cut is having been chopped.

original: dgra bo phyir bzlog pa'i don du gdu bu'i rnam pa lta bu'i khang pa sum rtseg gam lnga rtseg gi khang bzangs so //
analyzed: dgra bo phyir bzlog pa'i don du gdu bu'i rnam pa lta bu'i khang pa sum rtseg gam lnga rtseg gi khang bzangs so //
translated: A palace is a three-storied or five-storied mansion, like a bracelet, for the purpose of turning back enemies.

original: skyes pa med par zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dang shin tu bral ba'o //üîΩrol mo'i tshogs kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skyes pa med par zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dang shin tu bral ba'o // rol mo'i tshogs kyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: Without a man means completely devoid of men.üîΩBy the sound of music,

original: rol mo ni 'dir gar la bya'o //
analyzed: rol mo ni 'dir gar la bya'o //
translated: music here refers to dancing.

original: 'di ni dgar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'dir dga' ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'dir dga' ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase he will be happy means that he will experience happiness in this world.

original: gzhan du'ang dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du'ang dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du'o //
translated: The phrase he will be happy in the next world means that he will experience happiness in the next world.

original: de ni dgar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
analyzed: de ni dgar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
translated: The word he in the phrase he will be happy refers to the person who is not confused about the ripening of karma.

original: de nyid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang de nyid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang de nyid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase he will be happy means that he will be happy and that he will be very happy.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When will he be happy?

original: smras pa / bdag nyid las kyi rnam par smon pa mthong nas zhes smos so //üîΩmgu gyur zhes bya ba ni mgu ba skyes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: smras pa / bdag nyid las kyi rnam par smon pa mthong nas zhes smos so // mgu gyur zhes bya ba ni mgu ba skyes par gyur pa'o //
translated: The text states: When he sees the ripening of his karma.üîΩThe phrase he will be pleased means that he will experience pleasure.

original: bsngags par 'gyur bas na bde 'gro ste /
analyzed: bsngags par 'gyur bas na bde 'gro ste /
translated: The phrase he will go to a good rebirth means that he will go to a good rebirth because he has been praised.

original: gang gi tshe der 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe phyir 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe der 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe phyir 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When he goes there, he will go to a good rebirth.

original: ngom pa ni spyir bdag nyid stong bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ngom pa ni spyir bdag nyid stong bar byed pa ste /
translated: The phrase he will be satisfied means that he will be satisfied in general.

original: 'di ltar bdag ni stobs dang / brtson pa dang / pha rol gnon pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes ngom pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag ni stobs dang / brtson pa dang / pha rol gnon pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes ngom pa'o //
translated: He will be satisfied because he will think, I am strong, energetic, and powerful.

original: rnam par ngom pa ni khyad par du bdag dang 'dra bar 'ga' zhig kyang med de /
analyzed: rnam par ngom pa ni khyad par du bdag dang 'dra bar 'ga' zhig kyang med de /
translated: The word especially means that there is no one at all who is equal to me.

original: gang gi phyir kho bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gtso bor gyur pa'i sh'akya rnams brlag par gyur ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gtso bor gyur pa'i sh'akya rnams brlag par gyur ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Because I am the chief of the Sakyas in Jambudvipa,  he said.

original: bslab pa'i gzhi bsdams gyur ces bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa'i gzhis bsdams par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gzhi bsdams gyur ces bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa'i gzhis bsdams par gyur pa'o //
translated: The words I have taken up the bases of training mean that he has taken up the bases of training that turn away from killing and so forth.

original: klu rnams bsad bzhin zhes @41b bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: klu rnams bsad bzhin zhes @41b bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The words the nagas are being killed and so forth are as follows.

original: klu rnams gsad pa ste /
analyzed: klu rnams gsad pa ste /
translated: The nagas are being killed.

original: srog dang bral bar gyur na klu'i bu mo dag kyang gsad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: srog dang bral bar gyur na klu'i bu mo dag kyang gsad par bya ba yin te /
translated: When they are deprived of life, the naga maidens are also to be killed.

original: khyad du zhugs nas gnod par gyur na mi rung ba'o //
analyzed: khyad du zhugs nas gnod par gyur na mi rung ba'o //
translated: It is not right to let them go and harm us later.

original: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩsprin gyis g-yogs bzhin dug gis rab gang ba //
analyzed: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na / sprin gyis g-yogs bzhin dug gis rab gang ba //
translated: What is their special quality?

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The words covered with clouds, filled with poison are stated.

original: sprin te chu 'dzin gyis g-yogs shing khyab pa de bzhin du dug gis kyang /
analyzed: sprin te chu 'dzin gyis g-yogs shing khyab pa de bzhin du dug gis kyang /
translated: Just as they are covered and pervaded by clouds, which are water bearers, so also they are filled with poison.

original: kun nas gang bar gyur pa de'i phyir gsad par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: kun nas gang bar gyur pa de'i phyir gsad par bya ba yin na /
translated: Because they are filled with all of them, they are to be killed.

original: ji ltar de dag gsad par bya ba yin pa de bzhin du sh'akya'i bu mo de dag gi yang lag pa dang / rkang pa chod cig pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de dag gsad par bya ba yin pa de bzhin du sh'akya'i bu mo de dag gi yang lag pa dang / rkang pa chod cig pa'o //
translated: Just as they are to be killed, so also are the ≈öƒÅkya women to have their hands and feet cut off.üîΩBecause of the cutting off of their hands and feet, they will die.

original: gang gi phyir lag pa dang rkang pa bcad pa las shi bar gyur pa de dag nyid kyi gnyen rnams kyi ni phyi bzhin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lag pa dang rkang pa bcad pa las shi bar gyur pa de dag nyid kyi gnyen rnams kyi ni phyi bzhin te /
translated: Their relatives will follow after them,

original: slad bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slad bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will go along behind them.

original: sdug bsngal ni mi mthun par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni mi mthun par gyur pa'o //
translated: Suffering is discordant.

original: drag pa zhes bya ba ni chen po'o //
analyzed: drag pa zhes bya ba ni chen po'o //
translated: Violent means great.

original: rtsub pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma nyid nas brnag par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: rtsub pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma nyid nas brnag par dka' ba'o //
translated: Rough means difficult to bear from the very beginning.

original: tsha ba zhes bya ba ni mtha' mar brnag par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: tsha ba zhes bya ba ni mtha' mar brnag par dka' ba'o //
translated: Hot means difficult to bear in the end.

original: yid du mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni dran pa'i shes pas yul du byas pa na yang yid mi bde ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yid du mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni dran pa'i shes pas yul du byas pa na yang yid mi bde ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: Unpleasant means that even when it is taken as an object by the consciousness of memory, it produces mental dissatisfaction.

original: bsams pa ni yang dag par bskul ba'o //
analyzed: bsams pa ni yang dag par bskul ba'o //
translated: Thought means correct urging.

original: 'jig rten pa'i thugs zhes bya ba la 'jig rten la phan pas na 'jig rten pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i thugs zhes bya ba la 'jig rten la phan pas na 'jig rten pa ste /
translated: The mind of the world means the mind of the world, because it is beneficial to the world.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi thugs shes par gyur cig ces dgongs pa 'dis bskyed pa ni 'jig rten pa'i thugs so //üîΩde zag pa dang bcas pa 'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi thugs shes par gyur cig ces dgongs pa 'dis bskyed pa ni 'jig rten pa'i thugs so // de zag pa dang bcas pa 'am /
translated: The mind of the world is generated by the thought, ‚ÄúMay I know the minds of all worlds.‚Äù

original: zag med yin zhe na /
analyzed: zag med yin zhe na /
translated: Is that mind with or without outflows?

original: dus de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sems can thams cad kyis bde 'gro gzhan gyi sems shes pa thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dus de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sems can thams cad kyis bde 'gro gzhan gyi sems shes pa thob par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, through the power of the Blessed One, all beings will attain the knowledge of the minds of other beings in the fortunate realms.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa'am /
translated: It becomes common to all worlds,

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i thugs la 'jig rten pa'i thugs so zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i thugs la 'jig rten pa'i thugs so zhes bya'o //
translated: or it is called the mind of the world when it is a mind with outflows.

original: dbugs phyung shig ces bya ba ni dga' ba skyed cig pa'o //
analyzed: dbugs phyung shig ces bya ba ni dga' ba skyed cig pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBe consoled‚Äù means ‚Äúgenerate joy.‚Äù

original: las bdag gir gyis shig ces bya ba ni las la rten cig pa'o //üîΩlung mnod ba zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag len pa'o //
analyzed: las bdag gir gyis shig ces bya ba ni las la rten cig pa'o // lung mnod ba zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag len pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMake karma your own‚Äù means ‚Äúdepend on karma.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúRecite the scriptures‚Äù means ‚Äúreceive the instructions.‚Äù

original: klog pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bzung ba ltar klog pa'o //
analyzed: klog pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bzung ba ltar klog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúRead‚Äù means ‚Äúread what has been memorized.‚Äù

original: 'don pa ni klags pa mi brjed par bya ba'i 'don pa'o //
analyzed: 'don pa ni klags pa mi brjed par bya ba'i 'don pa'o //
translated: Recitation is recitation for the purpose of not forgetting what has been read.

original: nam rmus par gyur pa ni nyi ma sprin dang bcas par gyur pa'o //üîΩrgyan la nye bar spyod pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i gnas @42a * //
analyzed: nam rmus par gyur pa ni nyi ma sprin dang bcas par gyur pa'o // rgyan la nye bar spyod pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i gnas @42a * //
translated: When it is cloudy is when the sun is covered by clouds.

original: las phyi rol gyi nye 'khor du gyur pa'i sa ni nye bar spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: las phyi rol gyi nye 'khor du gyur pa'i sa ni nye bar spyod pa yin te /
translated: The enjoyment of ornaments is the ground that is external to the root ground.

original: 'chag pa don du gnyer ba rnams nye bar spyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chag pa don du gnyer ba rnams nye bar spyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is an enjoyment because it is enjoyed by those who seek to walk.

original: bud med kyi yang rgyan nye bar spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: bud med kyi yang rgyan nye bar spyod pa yin te /
translated: The enjoyment of ornaments is also a woman,

original: skyes bu'i sems dga' bar byed pa don du gnyer ba'i bud med dag rgyan la nye bar spyod cing sten par nye bar spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu'i sems dga' bar byed pa don du gnyer ba'i bud med dag rgyan la nye bar spyod cing sten par nye bar spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because women who seek to please the mind of a man enjoy and rely on ornaments.

original: nyi ma dang mthun zhing 'phrod pas na nor bu me shel te nyi ma'i 'od dang yang dag par 'byor pa na me 'byin par byed pa'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / bam po lnga pa /
analyzed: nyi ma dang mthun zhing 'phrod pas na nor bu me shel te nyi ma'i 'od dang yang dag par 'byor pa na me 'byin par byed pa'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / bam po lnga pa /
translated: The sun-crystal is a gem that is suitable and agreeable to the sun, because it produces fire when it is in perfect contact with the light of the sun.

original: 'di na tshig 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshe 'dir ro //
analyzed: 'di na tshig 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshe 'dir ro //
translated: Here, ‚Äúburned‚Äù means in this life.

original: gzhan du 'ang tshig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshe phyi mar ro //
analyzed: gzhan du 'ang tshig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshe phyi mar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAlso burned in another‚Äù means in the next life.

original: gnyis kar tshig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du cig car de tshig par 'gyur bas na sdig pa byed pa de dang de dag tshig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis kar tshig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du cig car de tshig par 'gyur bas na sdig pa byed pa de dang de dag tshig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBurned in both‚Äù means that because of that, the evildoers are burned in this life and in the next life.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: bdag nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa mthong nas zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bdag nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa mthong nas zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving seen the ripening of their karma.‚Äù

original: smad pa 'am dman pa'i 'gro ba ni ngan 'gro'o //
analyzed: smad pa 'am dman pa'i 'gro ba ni ngan 'gro'o //
translated: ‚ÄúInferior‚Äù means bad.

original: gdung 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yid kyi gdung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gdung 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yid kyi gdung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTormented‚Äù means mental anguish.

original: rgyan spel ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩgser skud kyi lcu gu gsum pa 'am /
analyzed: rgyan spel ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / gser skud kyi lcu gu gsum pa 'am /
translated: ‚ÄúBracelet‚Äù and so on.üîΩA bracelet is a string of gold beads with three or four strands,

original: bzhi pa'i tshogs kyi bar bar du rin po che sna tshogs kyi phra mdud kyis spras pa la gdu bu spel ma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i tshogs kyi bar bar du rin po che sna tshogs kyi phra mdud kyis spras pa la gdu bu spel ma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: adorned with knots of various jewels.

original: gser gyi phag bu'i dbus grog mo lta bu can gser skud kyis brgyus pa mtha' nas g-yer ka btags pa can dag las byas pa gser gyi 'og pag gang yin pa de ni phyang phrul can no //üîΩgser las byas pa'i rgyan zla gam gsum pa dag las byas pa'i 'og pag gang yin pa de ni lu gu rgyud do //
analyzed: gser gyi phag bu'i dbus grog mo lta bu can gser skud kyis brgyus pa mtha' nas g-yer ka btags pa can dag las byas pa gser gyi 'og pag gang yin pa de ni phyang phrul can no // gser las byas pa'i rgyan zla gam gsum pa dag las byas pa'i 'og pag gang yin pa de ni lu gu rgyud do //
translated: The one who wears a golden girdle made of golden snakes with ants in the middle, connected by golden threads, and with bells at the ends, is the one who wears a golden girdle.üîΩThe one who wears a girdle made of three half-moons made of gold is the one who wears a golden chain.

original: gser las byas pa'i skud pa ni rgyan gser skud can no //
analyzed: gser las byas pa'i skud pa ni rgyan gser skud can no //
translated: The one who wears a golden thread is the one who wears a golden thread.

original: longs spyod de 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag go //
analyzed: longs spyod de 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag go //
translated: Those who desire those enjoyments are the ones who desire enjoyments.

original: bdag kyang yun ring du lon pa ni rgas pa'i gnas skabs thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag kyang yun ring du lon pa ni rgas pa'i gnas skabs thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The one who has long been a self is the one who has attained the state of old age.

original: drang ba ni tha snyad du bya ba la gsal por byed pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba ni tha snyad du bya ba la gsal por byed pa'o //
translated: Straightforwardness is clarity in conventional activity.

original: g-yo kun du spyod pa ni las la sogs pas gya gyur spyod pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo kun du spyod pa ni las la sogs pas gya gyur spyod pa'o //
translated: Deceitful conduct is crookedness in action and so on.

original: shin tu drags pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni 'jigs pa med pa yin mod kyi 'dir bya ba ma yin pa las log pa la rag lus pa'i rab tu byung ba'i mi 'jigs pa gang yin pa ni mi @42b 'jigs pa rgya che ba dang / mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: shin tu drags pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni 'jigs pa med pa yin mod kyi 'dir bya ba ma yin pa las log pa la rag lus pa'i rab tu byung ba'i mi 'jigs pa gang yin pa ni mi @42b 'jigs pa rgya che ba dang / mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: The fearlessness of one who is very much fearless is indeed fearless, but the fearlessness of one who has gone forth, which depends on turning away from what should not be done, is the most extensive and supreme fearlessness.

original: spobs pa dge'o zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi shes rab skyes pa ni spobs pa yin la /
analyzed: spobs pa dge'o zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi shes rab skyes pa ni spobs pa yin la /
translated: Eloquence is virtuous means that one's own arisen wisdom is eloquence.

original: de dge ba ni yongs su dag pa yin te /
analyzed: de dge ba ni yongs su dag pa yin te /
translated: That virtue is pure,

original: rab tu byung ba'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the very object of going forth.

original: phan yon rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni yon tan rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: phan yon rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni yon tan rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: Five kinds of benefits means five kinds of qualities.

original: rang gi don ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rang gi don ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Regarding one's own undistorted purpose, and so on,

original: rab tu byung ba mos pa ni rab tu byung bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba mos pa ni rab tu byung bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: aspiring to go forth means desiring to go forth.

original: rang gi don ma 'dres pa ni skyes bu'i don thun mong ma yin pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi don ma 'dres pa ni skyes bu'i don thun mong ma yin pa yin te /
translated: One's own undistorted purpose is the uncommon purpose of a person,

original: don 'di ni skyes bu'i don kha cig mang po dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya ba thun mong la /
analyzed: don 'di ni skyes bu'i don kha cig mang po dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya ba thun mong la /
translated: This meaning is that some of the aims of a person are to be accomplished in common with many others.

original: myang ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni rang gi don thun mong ma yin pa yin bas na gzhan 'ga' zhig gis kyang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: myang ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni rang gi don thun mong ma yin pa yin bas na gzhan 'ga' zhig gis kyang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: But the characteristic of nirvana is the uncommon aim of oneself, and so it is not to be accomplished by any other.

original: 'on kyang gcig pu kho nas yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig pu kho nas yin no //
translated: However, it is accomplished by oneself alone.

original: de la don 'di ni mang po dang lhan cig bsgrubs pa gang yin pa 'di ni don dam par skyes bu'i don ma yin gyi 'on kyang rab tu byung ba thob pa'i sgo nas gcig pus bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa dang
analyzed: de la don 'di ni mang po dang lhan cig bsgrubs pa gang yin pa 'di ni don dam par skyes bu'i don ma yin gyi 'on kyang rab tu byung ba thob pa'i sgo nas gcig pus bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa dang
translated: In this regard, that which is accomplished in common with many others is not the ultimate aim of a person. However, that which is accomplished by oneself alone through obtaining renunciation is the uncommon,

original: / don dam pa dang / skyes bu'i don yin no //
analyzed: / don dam pa dang / skyes bu'i don yin no //
translated: the ultimate, and the aim of a person.

original: rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ni rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ni rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One will obtain the attainment of nirvana.

original: bran zhes bya ba ni khyim du skyes pa dang / rnyed pa dang / nyos pa dang / 'phrogs pa dang / khas blangs pa zhes bya ba rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: bran zhes bya ba ni khyim du skyes pa dang / rnyed pa dang / nyos pa dang / 'phrogs pa dang / khas blangs pa zhes bya ba rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The five kinds of servants are those born in the house, those purchased, those given, those inherited, and those who have come of their own accord.

original: mngag gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni nor gyis gsos nas mngag gzhug byed pa'o //
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni nor gyis gsos nas mngag gzhug byed pa'o //
translated: The servant who is a slave is one who is enslaved for a debt.üîΩThe servant who is a hireling is one who is employed for wages.

original: bsgo ba zhes bya ba ni nang 'khor dang chos grogs la sogs pa la bya'o //
analyzed: bsgo ba zhes bya ba ni nang 'khor dang chos grogs la sogs pa la bya'o //
translated: The servant who is a delegate is one who is a relative or friend.

original: gzhan la rag lus pa zhes bya ba ni rang dbang med pa zhang blon la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan la rag lus pa zhes bya ba ni rang dbang med pa zhang blon la sogs pa'o //
translated: The servant who is dependent is one who is not independent, such as a minister.

original: 'dod dgur 'gror med pa ni sna chen po la gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod dgur 'gror med pa ni sna chen po la gtogs pa ste /
translated: The servant who is a ward is one who is a great official.üîΩBecause he is not able to go elsewhere, because he is not able to leave his position, and because he is not able to go to another master, he is called a ward.

original: gang gi phyir de ni dbang phyug gi mchog gi sa las gzhan du 'gro ba'i nus pa med cing rtag tu sten par yang mi byed pa de'i phyir mngag gzhug pa la sogs pa bzhi po de dag ni phyi ma phyi ma zhing khyad par du 'phags parüîΩrig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni dbang phyug gi mchog gi sa las gzhan du 'gro ba'i nus pa med cing rtag tu sten par yang mi byed pa de'i phyir mngag gzhug pa la sogs pa bzhi po de dag ni phyi ma phyi ma zhing khyad par du 'phags parüîΩrig par bya'o //
translated: The four kinds of servants, beginning with the slave, are to be known as progressively superior.

original: mchod pa ni sbyin pa dang bsnyen bkur dang phyag la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni sbyin pa dang bsnyen bkur dang phyag la sogs pa'o //
translated: Worship is giving, service, prostration, etc.

original: bstod pa ni yon ta na smos pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: bstod pa ni yon ta na smos pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Praise is by way of proclaiming his virtues.

original: bla na med pa ni gong na gzhan med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa ni gong na gzhan med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Unsurpassed means that there is nothing higher than it.

original: rnal 'byor gyi bde ba ni ma thob pa thob pa dang thob pa so sor skyong ba'o //üîΩmya ngan @43a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi bde ba ni ma thob pa thob pa dang thob pa so sor skyong ba'o // mya ngan @43a * //
translated: The bliss of yoga is the attainment of what has not been attained, and the preservation of what has been attained.

original: las 'das pa 'khor ba srid du ma thob pa rnyed cing thob pa phyir mi gtong ba'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnal 'byor bde bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: las 'das pa 'khor ba srid du ma thob pa rnyed cing thob pa phyir mi gtong ba'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnal 'byor bde bar byed pa'o //
translated: The bliss of yoga is preeminent, because it causes the attainment of nirvana, which has not been attained, and the non-abandonment of what has been attained, for as long as samsara exists.

original: ma thob par zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das ba ma rnyed par ro //
analyzed: ma thob par zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das ba ma rnyed par ro //
translated: Not attaining means not finding nirvana.

original: bdag ces bya ni tshul khrims kyi yon tan rnyed pa las nyams par ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ni tshul khrims kyi yon tan rnyed pa las nyams par ma gyur pa'o //
translated: As for self, it is not falling away from the attainment of the virtues of morality.

original: nyan thos zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad do //
analyzed: nyan thos zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad do //
translated: The Hearers are the eight noble persons.

original: mchog ni drang srong dag go //
analyzed: mchog ni drang srong dag go //
translated: The best are the sages.

original: yang dag par song ba ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par song ba ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: The perfectly gone are the Bodhisattvas.

original: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo mkhas pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo mkhas pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The phrase by the holy ones means by the wise ordinary persons.

original: 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa kho na rang gi don ma 'dres pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa kho na rang gi don ma 'dres pa ma yin nam /
translated: Here, is not nirvana itself the unmixed benefit for oneself?

original: de bas na ci'i phyir phan yon de gnyis su byas she na /
analyzed: de bas na ci'i phyir phan yon de gnyis su byas she na /
translated: Therefore, why are these two benefits distinguished?

original: bden te mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid ni gcig tu khyim pa dang 'brel pa'i sgo nas thob par nus pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bden te mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid ni gcig tu khyim pa dang 'brel pa'i sgo nas thob par nus pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is true that nirvana itself is not capable of being attained by only one who is connected with the householders' life.

original: 'on kyang gcig pu kho nas zhes bstan pa'i phyir tha dad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig pu kho nas zhes bstan pa'i phyir tha dad par bya ba yin no //
translated: However, in order to demonstrate that only one attains nirvana, it is distinguished.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na rang gi don ma 'dres pa kho nar thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir lnga nyid du mi 'thad par 'gyur ba de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ni phan yon gcig yin la //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na rang gi don ma 'dres pa kho nar thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir lnga nyid du mi 'thad par 'gyur ba de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ni phan yon gcig yin la //
translated: Otherwise, since all are included in the unmixed benefit for oneself alone, it would not be tenable that there are five benefits. Therefore, attaining nirvana is one benefit.

original: de thob pa'i rgyu mtshan gcig pu nyid rab tu byung bas rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni phan yon gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: de thob pa'i rgyu mtshan gcig pu nyid rab tu byung bas rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni phan yon gnyis pa yin no //
translated: The reason for attaining that, namely, only the one who has gone forth obtains it, is the second benefit.

original: gang zhig bdag la mchod pa byed pa de dag la bdag gis mchod pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig bdag la mchod pa byed pa de dag la bdag gis mchod pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yin la /
translated: The third benefit is that those who worship me will be worshipped.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris thob pa ni bzhi pa yin zhing /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris thob pa ni bzhi pa yin zhing /
translated: The fourth benefit is that until attaining the nirvana they desire, they will attain high status.

original: skyes bu dam pas rab tu bsngags pa'i lam bsten pa ni 'dir phan yon lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pas rab tu bsngags pa'i lam bsten pa ni 'dir phan yon lnga pa yin no //
translated: The fifth benefit is that they will follow the path highly praised by holy beings.

original: bdag nyid kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba ni rang gi spyod yul gyi sa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba ni rang gi spyod yul gyi sa'o //
translated: One‚Äôs own domain is one‚Äôs own realm.

original: yab byon pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi dngos po rab tu skye ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yab byon pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi dngos po rab tu skye ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The land where one‚Äôs father came from is the place where the state of a monk arises.

original: bsod snyoms len pas dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi zas mang po yongs su tshol ba las ni ma yin no /
analyzed: bsod snyoms len pas dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi zas mang po yongs su tshol ba las ni ma yin no /
translated: One becomes a monk by accepting alms, not by seeking much food.

original: chung ma rnying pa zhes bya ba ni khyim pa'i gnas skabs na log par g-yem pa'i las lhan cig byed pa can bya ba ma yin pa thams cad la sems 'jug pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: chung ma rnying pa zhes bya ba ni khyim pa'i gnas skabs na log par g-yem pa'i las lhan cig byed pa can bya ba ma yin pa thams cad la sems 'jug pa de'i phyir /
translated: The term ‚Äúformer wife‚Äù refers to the mind that engages in all improper actions that are associated with the act of sexual misconduct during the householder stage of life.

original: khyod kyis sems srungs shig ces smos pa yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyis sems srungs shig ces smos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúYou should guard your mind.‚Äù

original: reg pa'i dug ces bya ba ni reg pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi dug ldang @43b bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: reg pa'i dug ces bya ba ni reg pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi dug ldang @43b bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúpoison of contact‚Äù is used because the poison of passion arises through mere contact.

original: rgyags pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ni rgyags pas rnam par rmongs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ni rgyags pas rnam par rmongs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúdarkness of intoxication‚Äù is used because one becomes confused through intoxication.

original: sred pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ni sred pas rmongs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ni sred pas rmongs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúdarkness of craving‚Äù is used because one becomes confused through craving.

original: mgo spra thog gi rnam pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni spra ba'i me tog bzhin du mgo dkar por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mgo spra thog gi rnam pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni spra ba'i me tog bzhin du mgo dkar por gyur pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúhead that is like a flame of dry grass‚Äù is used because the head becomes white, like the flower of dry grass.

original: rgan zhugs zhes bya ba ni na tshod rgas nas rab tu byung ba'o //
analyzed: rgan zhugs zhes bya ba ni na tshod rgas nas rab tu byung ba'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúold man‚Äù is used because one has gone forth after the age of youth has passed.

original: phan pa byas pa shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byas pa gzo ba'o //
analyzed: phan pa byas pa shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byas pa gzo ba'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúgrateful‚Äù is used because one is aware of what is beneficial.

original: byas pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis bdag la phan pa chen po byas so zhes gzhan la sgrog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byas pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis bdag la phan pa chen po byas so zhes gzhan la sgrog par byed pa'o //
translated: One who knows what is done is one who proclaims to others, This one has done me a great favor.

original: sbyor ba ni rab tu spyod ba dang bya ba ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni rab tu spyod ba dang bya ba ste /
translated: Practice is the performance of an action.

original: des nyams pa ni rgud par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des nyams pa ni rgud par gyur pa'o //
translated: By that, deterioration is decline.

original: de bas na 'di ltar dge slong dag gis mi tshangs par spyod pa bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes mi shes pa de'i phyir bsam pa ni ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ltar dge slong dag gis mi tshangs par spyod pa bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes mi shes pa de'i phyir bsam pa ni ma nyams pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since the monks do not know that one should not engage in sexual intercourse, their intention is not impaired.

original: phas pham pa bzhi ni mi tshangs par spyod pa las ldog pa la sogs bdag las so //
analyzed: phas pham pa bzhi ni mi tshangs par spyod pa las ldog pa la sogs bdag las so //
translated: The four defeats are from turning away from sexual intercourse, etc.

original: bdud ris ni bdud kyi sde yin la gtses pa ni gnod pa byas pas so //
analyzed: bdud ris ni bdud kyi sde yin la gtses pa ni gnod pa byas pas so //
translated: The class of Mara is Mara's army. Harmed means harm was done.

original: tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin la /üîΩde'i rgyu mtshan du spyod pa ni tshangs par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin la / de'i rgyu mtshan du spyod pa ni tshangs par spyod pa ste /
translated: Brahma is nirvana.üîΩThe practice that is the cause of that is pure conduct.

original: de dang 'gal ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa'o //
translated: Opposing that is impure conduct.

original: bya ba ma yin pa thams cad tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rgya rna ru zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa thams cad tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rgya rna ru zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: All unwholesome actions are unwholesome conduct. Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúlike a conch shell.‚Äù

original: skyes pa dang bud med kyi kun du sbyor ba ni 'khrig pa yin la /
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med kyi kun du sbyor ba ni 'khrig pa yin la /
translated: Sexual union is the union of male and female.

original: de 'byung ba'i las ni rgya rna ru'o //
analyzed: de 'byung ba'i las ni rgya rna ru'o //
translated: The action that produces that is a conch shell.

original: skal ba yod na zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam skyer rung ba'o //
analyzed: skal ba yod na zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam skyer rung ba'o //
translated: If one is fortunate means if one is suitable for the arising of the noble path.

original: ngo bzhin gnag cing mchi ma dang bcas pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni kha gdong ngan cing mchi mas khyab bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ngo bzhin gnag cing mchi ma dang bcas pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni kha gdong ngan cing mchi mas khyab bzhin du'o //
translated: With a face like a dark cloud and with tears means with a bad face and covered with tears.

original: bya ba ma yin pa byed pa ni bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa byed pa ni bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa'o //
translated: Unwholesome action is unwholesome conduct.

original: rang bzhin te dge slong gi bya ba la gnas pas na rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin te dge slong gi bya ba la gnas pas na rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
translated: Natural means abiding in the actions of a monk.

original: gsong por smra ba ni lus kyis phyag bya ba ma gtogs pa tshig gis phyag byed pa'o //üîΩphyag byed pa ni yan lag lngas gtugs pa 'am /
analyzed: gsong por smra ba ni lus kyis phyag bya ba ma gtogs pa tshig gis phyag byed pa'o // phyag byed pa ni yan lag lngas gtugs pa 'am /
translated: Speaking respectfully means speaking respectfully except for physical prostration.üîΩProstration is touching with five limbs

original: byin pa bcing ba'o //
analyzed: byin pa bcing ba'o //
translated: or binding the hands.

original: thal mo sbyar ba zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba sngon du song ba can gus pa'o //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba sngon du song ba can gus pa'o //
translated: The phrase with palms joined means with palms joined together, preceded by respect.

original: 'dud pa'i las ni lus kyis phyag byas pa sngon du song ba can no //
analyzed: 'dud pa'i las ni lus kyis phyag byas pa sngon du song ba can no //
translated: The action of bowing is preceded by physical obeisance.

original: bsu ba zhes bya ba ni gom pa'i rim pa gcig bsnur ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: bsu ba zhes bya ba ni gom pa'i rim pa gcig bsnur ba'i sgo nas so //
translated: The phrase to rise up means to rise up from one's seat.

original: mnyan pa dang lung nod pa nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o //üîΩgzhan rab tu 'byin pa dang dge tshul la gnas sbyin pa'i sgo nas kyang bsdu @44a * //
analyzed: mnyan pa dang lung nod pa nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o // gzhan rab tu 'byin pa dang dge tshul la gnas sbyin pa'i sgo nas kyang bsdu @44a * //
translated: One should not engage in listening to and reciting the scriptures.üîΩOne should not engage in attracting others by means of going forth and by giving the novice ordination.

original: bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not engage in attracting others by means of giving material things.

original: tshul khrims kyi rgud pa ni tshul khrims nyams pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi rgud pa ni tshul khrims nyams pa'o //
translated: The degeneration of morality is the violation of morality.

original: lta bas rgud pa ni lta ba phyin ci log pa dang smad pa can no //
analyzed: lta bas rgud pa ni lta ba phyin ci log pa dang smad pa can no //
translated: The degeneration of view is the perversion of view and the deprecation of the noble ones.

original: cho ga sa rgud pa ni spyod yul ma yin par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga sa rgud pa ni spyod yul ma yin par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The degeneration of conduct is going and coming in a manner that is not suitable.

original: 'tsho bas rgud pa ni kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba la sogs pa log pa'i 'tsho bas so //
analyzed: 'tsho bas rgud pa ni kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba la sogs pa log pa'i 'tsho bas so //
translated: The degeneration of livelihood is wrong livelihood, such as flattery, hypocrisy, and so on.

original: lci ba shin tu 'jam pos byugs shig ces bya ba ni lci ba sar pa bzang po dang ldan pas bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: lci ba shin tu 'jam pos byugs shig ces bya ba ni lci ba sar pa bzang po dang ldan pas bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Anoint with very soft oil means to apply fresh, good quality oil.

original: dus shes pa zhes bya ba ni zas kyi dus so //
analyzed: dus shes pa zhes bya ba ni zas kyi dus so //
translated: Knowing the time means the time for eating.

original: mthu ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: mthu ni nus pa'o //
translated: Power means ability.

original: zas bshams pa 'jog par byed pa'i gnas la zas kyi gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zas bshams pa 'jog par byed pa'i gnas la zas kyi gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: The place where the prepared food is set out is called the food place.

original: dus shes par byas la zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nub pa'i dus la tshogs pa'i dus so //
analyzed: dus shes par byas la zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nub pa'i dus la tshogs pa'i dus so //
translated: Having understood the time means the time for the assembly at sunset.

original: 'dug cing zhes bya ba ni byed bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dug cing zhes bya ba ni byed bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Sitting means while doing.

original: rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du'o //
translated: According to seniority means according to the order of higher ordination.

original: sos sam zhes bya ba ni khyed kyi khams snyoms sam zhes bya ba'o //üîΩdu ba'i reng bus zhes bya ba ni du ba skyed par byed pa'i thabs yang dag par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: sos sam zhes bya ba ni khyed kyi khams snyoms sam zhes bya ba'o // du ba'i reng bus zhes bya ba ni du ba skyed par byed pa'i thabs yang dag par sbyar ba'o //
translated: Are you well? means Is your element balanced?üîΩThe incense burner means the method for producing smoke.

original: rdze'u kha sbyar zhes bya ba ni rdze'u kha sbyar du byas pas so //
analyzed: rdze'u kha sbyar zhes bya ba ni rdze'u kha sbyar du byas pas so //
translated: The joined bowls means having made the bowls join.

original: gce'u zhes bya ba ni lcags las byas pa can du ba rngub pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gce'u zhes bya ba ni lcags las byas pa can du ba rngub pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: A tube is a hollow iron instrument used to inhale smoke.

original: rno ba ni mtshon ltar ro //
analyzed: rno ba ni mtshon ltar ro //
translated: Sharp is like a weapon.

original: snod ces bya ba ni de 'jog par byed pa'i rdzas so ;
analyzed: snod ces bya ba ni de 'jog par byed pa'i rdzas so ;
translated: A vessel is a substance used to hold it.

original: / rgyal srid la 'khor los 'jug pa'i ngang tshul can gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba yin la /
analyzed: / rgyal srid la 'khor los 'jug pa'i ngang tshul can gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba yin la /
translated: A cakravartin is one whose nature is to engage in ruling a kingdom with a wheel.

original: de'i gso ba ni nad zhi bar byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gso ba ni nad zhi bar byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: Its treatment is a method for curing illness.

original: gang gis sna sman gyi las byed pa de ni blugs spyod do //
analyzed: gang gis sna sman gyi las byed pa de ni blugs spyod do //
translated: One who performs the function of a nasal medicine is a nasal medicator.

original: brnangs pa ni zos pa'i kham mgrin pa'i phyogs su thogs pa'o //
analyzed: brnangs pa ni zos pa'i kham mgrin pa'i phyogs su thogs pa'o //
translated: Choking is when a mouthful of food is stuck in the throat.

original: gang gis kham thogs pa gal te bsal bar bya ba'i 'phul ba'i spyad kyis btung bar byed pa ni 'phul ba'i btung phor ro //
analyzed: gang gis kham thogs pa gal te bsal bar bya ba'i 'phul ba'i spyad kyis btung bar byed pa ni 'phul ba'i btung phor ro //
translated: If one is choked by a mouthful of food, one should drink water to remove it.

original: khyogs zhes bya ba ni rta g-yag rnga'i tshom bus sbyangs pa dang / dril bu btags pa'i khyogs byas nas so //
analyzed: khyogs zhes bya ba ni rta g-yag rnga'i tshom bus sbyangs pa dang / dril bu btags pa'i khyogs byas nas so //
translated: A palanquin is a palanquin carried by a group of men, decorated with bells.

original: 'jig rten la bu bzhin du sems shing zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'ga' zhig bu'i nang du 'gro bar gyur pa na gus par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du des gus par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten la bu bzhin du sems shing zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'ga' zhig bu'i nang du 'gro bar gyur pa na gus par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du des gus par 'gyur zhing /
translated: He thinks of the world as if it were his own son means that just as a father is not disrespectful to his son, he is not disrespectful to the world.

original: de bzhin du de dag kyang gus par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de dag kyang gus par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: And just as the son is not disrespectful to the father, so the world is not disrespectful to him.

original: nags dang thag nye ba'i sa phyogs ni shing rtsa'o //üîΩbshang ba kun du skyes pas na bshang ba bro bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nags dang thag nye ba'i sa phyogs ni shing rtsa'o // bshang ba kun du skyes pas na bshang ba bro bar gyur pa'o //
translated: A forest-like place is a place with trees.üîΩA place with excrement is a place where excrement is produced.

original: gci ba kun du skyes pas na @44b gci ba bro bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gci ba kun du skyes pas na @44b gci ba bro bar gyur pa ste /
translated: A place with urine is a place where urine is produced.

original: gci ba'i dbang du gyur pa gang yin pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gci ba'i dbang du gyur pa gang yin pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who is under the power of excrement and urine is called one who is overcome by excrement and urine.

original: tsher mas nye bar mtshon pa tsher ma dang ldan pas na tsher ma can no //
analyzed: tsher mas nye bar mtshon pa tsher ma dang ldan pas na tsher ma can no //
translated: A place with thorns is a place with thorns.

original: bshang ba dang gci ba'i skyabs kyis zhes bya ba ni khang pa'i rnam pa lta bur ro //
analyzed: bshang ba dang gci ba'i skyabs kyis zhes bya ba ni khang pa'i rnam pa lta bur ro //
translated: A place with excrement and urine is a place that is like a house.

original: gdung rings ni shing gi gdung ma chen po'o //
analyzed: gdung rings ni shing gi gdung ma chen po'o //
translated: A long beam is a large wooden beam.

original: bu gu gtod pa ni phyir phyogs par ro //
analyzed: bu gu gtod pa ni phyir phyogs par ro //
translated: A hole is a cavity.

original: gtsang sgra tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni phan tshun gtsang sbra tha dad pa de'i phyir kho bo ril bas chu btung bar mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtsang sgra tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni phan tshun gtsang sbra tha dad pa de'i phyir kho bo ril bas chu btung bar mi bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase different in their purity means that they are different in their mutual purity. Therefore, I should not drink water from a vessel that has been used by another person.

original: snod dben par brug pa la sogs pa'i bya ba la lhag par sbyar bas na snod spyad 'brug pa'o //
analyzed: snod dben par brug pa la sogs pa'i bya ba la lhag par sbyar bas na snod spyad 'brug pa'o //
translated: The phrase a vessel that has been used means that it has been used for the purpose of washing the mouth, etc.

original: chu khang zhes bya ba ni chu gzhag par bya ba'i don gyi gnas so //
analyzed: chu khang zhes bya ba ni chu gzhag par bya ba'i don gyi gnas so //
translated: The phrase a water-pot means a place where water is kept.

original: so phag gi phag gu so btang ba yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: so phag gi phag gu so btang ba yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The phrase a brick means a piece of baked clay.

original: gzhi zhes bya ba ni bum pa mi g-yo zhing brtan par gnas pas sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi zhes bya ba ni bum pa mi g-yo zhing brtan par gnas pas sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase a base means a support that is firm and stable.

original: sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni sa la gnas par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni sa la gnas par gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase earth-dwelling yak·π£as means those who live on the earth.

original: sgra 'byin cing zhes bya ba ni sgra cung zad 'don par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgra 'byin cing zhes bya ba ni sgra cung zad 'don par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase they make a sound means that they make a slight noise.

original: dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i sgra mthon po sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i sgra mthon po sgrogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase they utter a sound means that they make a loud noise that produces an auditory consciousness in another person.

original: bskal par bzhugs zhes bya ba ni bskal pa chen por ro //
analyzed: bskal par bzhugs zhes bya ba ni bskal pa chen por ro //
translated: Abiding for an eon means abiding for a great eon.

original: bar snang la rgyu ba rnams ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bar snang la rgyu ba rnams ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'o //
translated: Those who move in space are in the sky.

original: de nas skad cig ces bya ba ni bud med ras bal gyi 'da' ba las myur du 'khal ba'i dpung pa brgyang ba'i mthar thug pa'i dus de tsam la 'dir skad cig mar 'dod de skad cig ma des myur du song nas so //
analyzed: de nas skad cig ces bya ba ni bud med ras bal gyi 'da' ba las myur du 'khal ba'i dpung pa brgyang ba'i mthar thug pa'i dus de tsam la 'dir skad cig mar 'dod de skad cig ma des myur du song nas so //
translated: Then, in an instant means that in the time it takes to quickly spin a thread of cotton from a woman‚Äôs finger, the sound reached the peak of existence.

original: thang cig ces bya ba ni tsa sha ka gnyis la grags pa yin te de'i nang du song nas so //
analyzed: thang cig ces bya ba ni tsa sha ka gnyis la grags pa yin te de'i nang du song nas so //
translated: In a moment means that it is known as two cƒÅ·π£akas, and it went in that time.

original: yud tsam zhes bya ba ni chu tshod gnyis la grags pa yin te des dal gyis song nas so //
analyzed: yud tsam zhes bya ba ni chu tshod gnyis la grags pa yin te des dal gyis song nas so //
translated: In a short time means that it is known as two hours, and it went slowly in that time.

original: de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir skad cig ma la sogs pa 'dus pa'i dus gang yin pa de la dal gyis song nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir skad cig ma la sogs pa 'dus pa'i dus gang yin pa de la dal gyis song nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Then, in an instant, a moment, a short time means that in the time when an instant and so on are gathered, the sound went slowly and reached the world of BrahmƒÅ.

original: mang po rnams la bar chad byas zhes bya ba ni sgra de thos par gyur pas yid rnam par 'khrugs te dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i bar chad skyes par gyur pa 'am /
analyzed: mang po rnams la bar chad byas zhes bya ba ni sgra de thos par gyur pas yid rnam par 'khrugs te dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i bar chad skyes par gyur pa 'am /
translated: The phrase they create obstacles for many means that because they hear that sound, their minds are disturbed and they create obstacles to listening to the holy Dharma.

original: yang na bskal par bzhugs shig ces thos pa las de dag ltos pa dang bcas pa skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na bskal par bzhugs shig ces thos pa las de dag ltos pa dang bcas pa skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Or else, they hear the Buddha say, Live for an eon! and they develop attachment.

original: yul 'di la bcom ldan 'das bskal @45a * //
analyzed: yul 'di la bcom ldan 'das bskal @45a * //
translated: They think, Because the Lord has lived for an eon in this place,

original: par bzhugs pa de'i phyir thar pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba byed pa'i spro ba chung ba skye bar 'gyur zhing phyis bya'o snyam pas de dag gi bsod nams chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par bzhugs pa de'i phyir thar pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba byed pa'i spro ba chung ba skye bar 'gyur zhing phyis bya'o snyam pas de dag gi bsod nams chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ro //
translated: I have little enthusiasm for the practice that is consistent with liberation, and I will do it later, and thus they create an obstacle to their own great merit.

original: mthun mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dam phan tshun mthun pa rjes su sbyin pas na mthun mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: mthun mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dam phan tshun mthun pa rjes su sbyin pas na mthun mi phyed pa'o //
translated: The phrase they are not of one mind about what is agreeable means that they do not agree about the enjoyment of Dharma or material things, or about what is agreeable to each other.

original: dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba la rab tu dga' bas na kun du dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba la rab tu dga' bas na kun du dga' ba'o //
translated: The phrase they are not delighted with the increase of virtue means that they are not delighted with the increase of virtue.

original: phan tshun lta bar 'dod pas log pa'i rtsod pa'i tshogs spangs pas na mi rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun lta bar 'dod pas log pa'i rtsod pa'i tshogs spangs pas na mi rtsod pa'o //
translated: It is non-disputatious, since it abandons the multitude of false disputations which desire to see each other's faults.

original: sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa las rtse gcig pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa yongs su skyong bar byed pas na mchog gcig pa'o //
analyzed: sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa las rtse gcig pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa yongs su skyong bar byed pas na mchog gcig pa'o //
translated: It is single-pointed, since it protects the single-pointedness of the mind which is not yet in equipoise.

original: so sor thar pa tha mi dad par 'don pas dang / phan tshun klog par bya ba nyid yin pas na 'don pa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: so sor thar pa tha mi dad par 'don pas dang / phan tshun klog par bya ba nyid yin pas na 'don pa gcig pa'o //
translated: It is recited together, since it is recited without distinction of the pratimoksa, and since it is to be recited together.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa nyid kyis na chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa nyid kyis na chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa'o //
translated: It is like water and milk together, since it is not dependent on others.

original: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das yin la /
analyzed: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das yin la /
translated: The Teacher is the Lord.

original: bstan pa ni bka' yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa ni bka' yin no //
translated: The Teaching is the scriptures.

original: gsal bar gyur pa ni rab tu gsal bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar gyur pa ni rab tu gsal bar gyur pa'o //
translated: It is well-illuminated, since it is well-illuminated.

original: de la bltas pa kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas na legs par phyag byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de la bltas pa kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas na legs par phyag byas pa yin no //
translated: It is well-worshipped, since it is worshipped by merely seeing it, and by worshipping the Tathagata.

original: sru ni yul gyi mched zla'o //
analyzed: sru ni yul gyi mched zla'o //
translated: The aunt is the sister of the mother.

original: brtson 'grus brtsams shing zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus de la gzhol bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams shing zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus de la gzhol bar gyur pa'o //
translated: It is well-practiced, since it is practiced by those who have undertaken striving.

original: bdag rab 'jog ces bya ba ni sems dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la so sor 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: bdag rab 'jog ces bya ba ni sems dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la so sor 'jog pa'o //
translated: The phrase one who is well-established means one who is well-established in the cultivation of virtuous spiritual qualities.

original: brtan pa pha rol gnon pa ni thams cad du dge ba'i bya ba la brtan pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa pha rol gnon pa ni thams cad du dge ba'i bya ba la brtan pa'o //
