translated: The phrase one who is steadfast and heroic means one who is steadfast in all virtuous activities.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana by means of a body that is capable of enduring.

original: lus 'dzin pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su mya nang las 'das pa bdag nyid 'dod bas na brtun te mya ngan las 'das pa 'tshal ba'am /
analyzed: lus 'dzin pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su mya nang las 'das pa bdag nyid 'dod bas na brtun te mya ngan las 'das pa 'tshal ba'am /
translated: The phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she is incapable of enduring.

original: gnas pa nyid mi nus pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gnas pa nyid mi nus pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she is capable of enduring.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.

original: lus 'dzin par nus pa de dag gis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba'o //üîΩbcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan gnyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: lus 'dzin par nus pa de dag gis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba'o //üîΩbcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan gnyis brjod pa'o //
translated: The phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.üîΩThe phrase one who is desirous of attaining nirvana means one who is desirous of attaining nirvana because he or she has seen the virtues of nirvana and the disadvantages of samsara.

original: de lta bu'i chos can yin na zhes bya ba ni rnam par mthong ba'i chos can no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos can yin na zhes bya ba ni rnam par mthong ba'i chos can no //
translated: The phrase if one is such a dharma-possessor refers to one who is a dharma-possessor in the sense of one who has seen the truths.

original: mngon par bstod pa ni sems kyis so //
analyzed: mngon par bstod pa ni sems kyis so //
translated: Praise is by way of the mind.

original: @45b rjes su yi rang ba ni ngag gis so //
analyzed: @45b rjes su yi rang ba ni ngag gis so //
translated: Rejoicing is by way of speech.

original: rnam par ma 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin ma 'khrul pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rnam par ma 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin ma 'khrul pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Without error is by way of intention, latent impression, element, and nature.

original: lus las 'od zer nges par 'byung ba'i rgyu can gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: lus las 'od zer nges par 'byung ba'i rgyu can gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: It is a samadhi that is the cause of the definite arising of light rays from the body.

original: gzi brjid kyi rgyur gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid kyi rgyur gyur pa la'o //
translated: It is the cause of splendor.

original: btsod kyi mdog ces bya ba ni 'od zer gyi kha dog btsod kyi rnam pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: btsod kyi mdog ces bya ba ni 'od zer gyi kha dog btsod kyi rnam pa lta bu'o //
translated: The phrase the color of vermillion means that the color of the light rays is like the color of vermillion.

original: zung ni phrugs la bya ba'o //
analyzed: zung ni phrugs la bya ba'o //
translated: A pair means a set of two.

original: bsam gtan dang po la brten nas zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sems kyis de ma thag so sor yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la brten nas zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sems kyis de ma thag so sor yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The phrase based upon the first concentration means that one attains nirvana immediately after the first concentration mind.

original: lus la mchod pa lhag par bya ba zhes bya ba ni lus la mchod pa'i rgyu can no //
analyzed: lus la mchod pa lhag par bya ba zhes bya ba ni lus la mchod pa'i rgyu can no //
translated: The phrase the cause of the supreme worship of the body means that it is the cause of the worship of the body.

original: yid brtan pa drang srong byin dang rnying pa zhes bya ba ni grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang du mchog tu yid ches pa gang yin pa de la yid brtan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid brtan pa drang srong byin dang rnying pa zhes bya ba ni grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang du mchog tu yid ches pa gang yin pa de la yid brtan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The two who were ‚Äútrustworthy‚Äù were Bhƒ´ma and Jƒ´ra·πáƒ´, who were most trusted in the villages and royal palaces.

original: dge slong dag ltos shig ces bya ba ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lus la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag ltos shig ces bya ba ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lus la sogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMonks, look!‚Äù refers to the bodies of MahƒÅprajƒÅpatƒ´ and the others.

original: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la yang de dag gi lus ston par mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la yang de dag gi lus ston par mdzad ce na /
translated: Why did the Blessed One show their bodies to the monks?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad ni dbang du gyur pa bzhin du lus 'dzin pa'i nus pa dang ldan zhing lus rgas pas nyams pa med pa de /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad ni dbang du gyur pa bzhin du lus 'dzin pa'i nus pa dang ldan zhing lus rgas pas nyams pa med pa de /
translated: In order to demonstrate the faults of cyclic existence, in order to demonstrate the unique qualities of nirvƒÅ·πáa, and in order to show that the Blessed One had the ability to control all of them and that his body was not impaired by old age,

original: gang gi phyir 'di dag gi lus ni gzhon nu ma lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang mtshungs pa de'i phyir 'khor ba la cher skyo bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phan yon chen po mthong ba las mngon par 'don pa spel bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di dag gi lus ni gzhon nu ma lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang mtshungs pa de'i phyir 'khor ba la cher skyo bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phan yon chen po mthong ba las mngon par 'don pa spel bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no /
translated: Because their bodies are like the bodies of sixteen-year-old girls, they are taught in order to increase disgust with cyclic existence and to increase the desire for nirvana, seeing its great benefits.

original: mi rtag pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / yid brtan du med pa nyid dang / chos thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / yid brtan du med pa nyid dang / chos thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Possessing impermanence means all conditioned things are impermanent, undependable, and all dharmas are subject to change, and so on.

original: sa blangs pa ni yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i don du mgo bo'i phyogs su sa'i chang pas bskor ba'o //üîΩgos sngon po can zhes bya ba ni yongs su bgo bar bya ba sngo ba ste /
analyzed: sa blangs pa ni yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i don du mgo bo'i phyogs su sa'i chang pas bskor ba'o // gos sngon po can zhes bya ba ni yongs su bgo bar bya ba sngo ba ste /
translated: The earth-holding means the earth is held in the direction of the head by the earth-holding naga kings.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor nye gnas rtag tu thag nye ba gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis so //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor nye gnas rtag tu thag nye ba gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis so //
translated: The blue-clad means the blue-clad ones are the five hundred constant attendants and close disciples of Vajrapani.

original: mdangs zhes @46a * //
analyzed: mdangs zhes @46a * //
translated: The radianceüîΩ

original: bya ba ni snying gi phyogs na gnas pa srog 'dzin par byed pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag yin la /
analyzed: bya ba ni snying gi phyogs na gnas pa srog 'dzin par byed pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag yin la /
translated: The ‚Äúluster‚Äù is a particular type of substance that resides in the heart and maintains life.

original: de 'phrogs pa ni gnas nas bskyod pa yin te /
analyzed: de 'phrogs pa ni gnas nas bskyod pa yin te /
translated: When it is ‚Äúremoved‚Äù from its place, it is ‚Äústirred up.‚Äù

original: de bskyod pa ni skye bo yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bskyod pa ni skye bo yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is stirred up, a person does not live long.

original: 'tsho ba la chags pa ni 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'tsho ba la chags pa ni 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúAttachment to life‚Äù means having the intention to live.

original: nges par zhes bya ba ni nges par byed pas na nges pa ste /
analyzed: nges par zhes bya ba ni nges par byed pas na nges pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúCertainly‚Äù means ‚Äúcertainty,‚Äù because it is that which makes something certain.

original: mthong ba'i lam yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam yin te /
translated: It is the path of seeing,

original: yang dag par nges pa'i phung po nges par byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde rtsom pa ni skyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par nges pa'i phung po nges par byed pa'i phyir ro // de rtsom pa ni skyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: because it makes the aggregates certain in the sense of making them truly certain.üîΩ‚ÄúIt is the beginning of that‚Äù means it is the producer of that.

original: rtsom pa de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúendowed with that beginning.‚Äù

original: khu ba thams cad ni nyams la phan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: khu ba thams cad ni nyams la phan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚ÄúAll the vital fluids are restored‚Äù means they are made strong.

original: nyams ni 'dir stobs kyi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: nyams ni 'dir stobs kyi rnam grangs so //
translated: ‚ÄúRestored‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äústrong.‚Äù

original: brkos te zhes bya ba ni phur pa 'debs pa ltar rko bar byed pa na'o //
analyzed: brkos te zhes bya ba ni phur pa 'debs pa ltar rko bar byed pa na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDigging‚Äù means digging like a post hole.

original: lag zungs bcug na 'khrul zhing zhes bya ba ni lag zungs 'dzin par byed pa'i gzer bus sgo'i sgo glegs la klan pa lag pas bskyod pa'i sgo nas te klan pa nyid du 'dod pa'o//
analyzed: lag zungs bcug na 'khrul zhing zhes bya ba ni lag zungs 'dzin par byed pa'i gzer bus sgo'i sgo glegs la klan pa lag pas bskyod pa'i sgo nas te klan pa nyid du 'dod pa'o//
translated: If you insert a pin, it will be confused means that the pin that holds the door bolt is inserted into the door frame by moving it with the hand, and it is asserted that it is the pin itself.

original: gsor bu zhes bya ba ni gsor dang 'dra ba'i shing gi yu ba can te srub pa'i thabs yin te /
analyzed: gsor bu zhes bya ba ni gsor dang 'dra ba'i shing gi yu ba can te srub pa'i thabs yin te /
translated: The pivot is a wooden handle like a drill, which is the method of turning.

original: des bug pa gtod nas lag zungs dang 'brel pa'i lcags kyi gzer bu me la bsros nas bug par gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: des bug pa gtod nas lag zungs dang 'brel pa'i lcags kyi gzer bu me la bsros nas bug par gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having made a hole with that, the iron pin connected to the door bolt is heated in the fire and inserted into the hole.

original: rlung gis gnod par gyur te /
analyzed: rlung gis gnod par gyur te /
translated: It is harmed by wind.

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi nad kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi nad kyis so //
translated: means by a wind illness.

original: 'dir tshad chen po'i nal zel sman gyi nal zer shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir tshad chen po'i nal zel sman gyi nal zer shes par bya ste /
translated: Here, one should know the great measure of the medicinal nala.

original: chu bsror yang btub pa'o //
analyzed: chu bsror yang btub pa'o //
translated: It is also suitable for heating water.

original: lcags kyi gzar bu ni lcags kyi gzar bu chen po'o //
analyzed: lcags kyi gzar bu ni lcags kyi gzar bu chen po'o //
translated: The iron ladle is a large iron ladle.

original: shing gi thal phyags zhes bya ba ni gand'i'i the'u'i rnam pa lta bur yu ba ring po can du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: shing gi thal phyags zhes bya ba ni gand'i'i the'u'i rnam pa lta bur yu ba ring po can du byas pa yin no //
translated: The wooden broom is made with a long handle like the shape of a drum stick.

original: khri ni 'dir khri'u chung ngu la bya'o //
analyzed: khri ni 'dir khri'u chung ngu la bya'o //
translated: Here, cot means a small cot.

original: sngas nang tshangs can ni 'dir nang tshangs kyi dbyibs che ba yin te /
analyzed: sngas nang tshangs can ni 'dir nang tshangs kyi dbyibs che ba yin te /
translated: Here, pillow means a large pillow.

original: gang gi tshe nyal ba'i dus na rgyab phyogs su gzhag pa de la bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyal ba'i dus na rgyab phyogs su gzhag pa de la bya'o //
translated: When it is time to sleep, it is placed behind the back.

original: gzong bu ni shing mkhan gyi rdzas yin te /
analyzed: gzong bu ni shing mkhan gyi rdzas yin te /
translated: An adze is a carpenter's tool.

original: gang gis shing gcod pa dang / 'bigs par byed pa'o //üîΩste'u ni shing mkhan gyis 'jog pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis shing gcod pa dang / 'bigs par byed pa'o // ste'u ni shing mkhan gyis 'jog pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: It is used to cut and chop wood.üîΩA chisel is a carpenter's tool.

original: skas ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa brtsams pa'i las sar gyi grogs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skas ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa brtsams pa'i las sar gyi grogs su gyur pa'o //
translated: A ladder is a means of access to a temple and so on.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mdo mas kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / ljags ring la srab pa dag ma @46b gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mdo mas kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / ljags ring la srab pa dag ma @46b gtogs pa'o //
translated: Possessing the thirty marks of a great being means possessing the thirty marks of a great being, except for the testicles being retracted into the body and the tongue being long and thin.

original: shin tu chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pas 'dod chags dga' mgur spyod pas na chags pa nyid do //
analyzed: shin tu chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pas 'dod chags dga' mgur spyod pas na chags pa nyid do //
translated: Attachment, etc. means attachment, anger, and delusion.

original: nye bar 'gro bar 'dun pas na zhen pa nyid do //üîΩyan lag 'dzin par 'dun pas na 'chums pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'gro bar 'dun pas na zhen pa nyid do // yan lag 'dzin par 'dun pas na 'chums pa'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúattachment‚Äù because of the desire to go to it.üîΩIt is ‚Äúcraving‚Äù because of the desire to grasp the limbs.

original: gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor bar 'dun pas na mdud pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor bar 'dun pas na mdud pa'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúknot‚Äù because of the desire to unite the two.

original: sems rnam par rmongs pa 'am /
analyzed: sems rnam par rmongs pa 'am /
translated: It is ‚Äúdelusion‚Äù because of the confusion of the mind.

original: lus rnam par 'gyur bas na rgyal ba nyid do //
analyzed: lus rnam par 'gyur bas na rgyal ba nyid do //
translated: It is ‚Äúvictory‚Äù because of the transformation of the body.

original: 'khrig pa'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas kyang de la zhen pas na lhag par chags pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'khrig pa'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas kyang de la zhen pas na lhag par chags pa nyid do //
translated: It is ‚Äúexcessive attachment‚Äù because of attachment to it after the act of love is completed.

original: lhag par chags par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: lhag par chags par gyur pa ni /
translated: One who is ‚Äúexcessively attached‚Äù

original: gzhan dag de la nye bar spyod pa bzlog par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag de la nye bar spyod pa bzlog par 'dod pa'o //
translated: is one who wishes to prevent others from enjoying it.

original: 'od zer ni 'od la bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer ni 'od la bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLight‚Äù is to be understood as radiance.

original: mtshan ma ni bde ba dang / mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i don du dpral ba'i phyogs su thig le byas pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni bde ba dang / mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i don du dpral ba'i phyogs su thig le byas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSign‚Äù is the drop placed on the forehead for the sake of the perfection of beauty and bliss.

original: gsol bar ma nus pa'i zhes bya ba ni dka' bar de'i zhabs drung du phyin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsol bar ma nus pa'i zhes bya ba ni dka' bar de'i zhabs drung du phyin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúUnable to request‚Äù means that it is difficult to approach him in order to request it.

original: ma spobs pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar phyin nas zhu ba'i skabs dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma spobs pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar phyin nas zhu ba'i skabs dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase lacking in confidence means that it is difficult to request instruction when one has approached the teacher.

original: stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'dra bar yan lag bzhi po de nyid kyis rgyal srid la dbang bsgyur ba'i stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'dra bar yan lag bzhi po de nyid kyis rgyal srid la dbang bsgyur ba'i stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase one who turns the wheel through power is similar to the cakravartin who rules the kingdom through the power of the four branches.

original: mkhrig ma zhes bya ba ni gdu bu 'dogs pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: mkhrig ma zhes bya ba ni gdu bu 'dogs pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The phrase at the wrist means the place where one wears a bracelet.

original: 'dir kha cig na re gal te dga' bo'i dus thams cad du 'bros pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin na de la ji ltar sdom ba skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig na re gal te dga' bo'i dus thams cad du 'bros pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin na de la ji ltar sdom ba skye bar 'gyur /
translated: Here, some say, If Nanda always had the intention to run away, how could he have taken the vow?

original: sdom pa skye ba brtan pa dang dge pa'i sems la rab tu rag lus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes rjod par byed de /
analyzed: sdom pa skye ba brtan pa dang dge pa'i sems la rab tu rag lus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes rjod par byed de /
translated: They say, The arising of the vow depends on a firm and virtuous mind.

original: de ni 'dir bla ma'i lung las dga' bo ni shin tu 'dod chags drag pas sems brtan pa dang // sems nyon mongs pa can yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'dir bla ma'i lung las dga' bo ni shin tu 'dod chags drag pas sems brtan pa dang // sems nyon mongs pa can yin te /
translated: Here, according to the scriptures, Nanda had a mind of strong and intense desire, and his mind was afflicted.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang dge 'dun dang thag nye bar 'dug pa na de'i sems 'dod chags dang / kun nas ldan pa ldog pa dang dge ba'i sems mngon sum du gyur pa yin pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang dge 'dun dang thag nye bar 'dug pa na de'i sems 'dod chags dang / kun nas ldan pa ldog pa dang dge ba'i sems mngon sum du gyur pa yin pas /
translated: When one sits in the presence of the Bhagavat and the Sangha, the mind that is associated with attachment is averted and a virtuous mind manifests.

original: dge ba'i sems dang sdom pa skye ba zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems dang sdom pa skye ba zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, there is no contradiction in saying that a virtuous mind and the vows arise.üîΩAs for the dilapidated temple, the text says, ‚ÄúYou should repair it.‚Äù

original: gtsug lag khang yongs su nyams pa gang yin pa de yang zhes bya ba ni dge slong 'ga' zhig gis kyang gtsug lag khang gi kun du spyod pa'i las /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang yongs su nyams pa gang yin pa de yang zhes bya ba ni dge slong 'ga' zhig gis kyang gtsug lag khang gi kun du spyod pa'i las /
translated: This means that if any monk has not performed the duties of the temple,

original: ma byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad khyod kyis @47a * //üîΩgyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad khyod kyis @47a * // gyis shig pa'o //
translated: then all of them should do it.

original: skyo ba ni dub pas skyo ba'o //
analyzed: skyo ba ni dub pas skyo ba'o //
translated: Discouragement means discouragement due to fatigue.

original: lam phran ni gseb lam mo //
analyzed: lam phran ni gseb lam mo //
translated: A narrow path is a small path.

original: kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: Having the right color means having the perfect color.

original: du ru ska'i 'bru mar ni du ru ska'i dri'i rdzas kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar ro //
analyzed: du ru ska'i 'bru mar ni du ru ska'i dri'i rdzas kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar ro //
translated: The oil of durva grass is oil perfumed with durva grass.

original: yid dga' ba zhes bya ba ni sems rab tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: yid dga' ba zhes bya ba ni sems rab tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The mind is delighted means the mind is very much delighted.

original: shin tu yid mgu ba ni yid mgu bas so //
analyzed: shin tu yid mgu ba ni yid mgu bas so //
translated: The mind is very much pleased means the mind is pleased.

original: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po mngon par 'dod pa'i sgo nas gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po mngon par 'dod pa'i sgo nas gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The utterance of joy is the expression of the desired thing through desire.

original: ae ma ho ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: ae ma ho ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: Oh, how wonderful!

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: The Blessed Buddha, endowed with virtues, is very wonderful.

original: de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun yang ngo //
translated: Likewise, the Dharma and the Sa·πÖgha are also.

original: legs par gsungs pa'i chos ni 'bras bu nges pa la 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i chos ni 'bras bu nges pa la 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The well-spoken Dharma is the absence of error in the definite result.

original: 'dzag snod ces bya ba ni dbang po rab tu gzhug pa'i phyir bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzag snod ces bya ba ni dbang po rab tu gzhug pa'i phyir bstan pa'o //
translated: The receptacle of discharge is the teaching for the complete engagement of the faculties.

original: de bzhin du bcangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni yongs su sbyong ba'i las ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bcangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni yongs su sbyong ba'i las ma byas pa'o //
translated: Likewise, not held means not performing the function of purification.

original: punda r'i ka la rtog bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi kun du sbyor ba dang yang dag par ldan pas so //
analyzed: punda r'i ka la rtog bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi kun du sbyor ba dang yang dag par ldan pas so //
translated: As if he were a Pundarika, means: as if he were endowed with the fetter of passion.

original: sems chags shing zhes bya ba ni skad cig tsam yang de dang 'bral bar gnas pa nyid du mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: sems chags shing zhes bya ba ni skad cig tsam yang de dang 'bral bar gnas pa nyid du mi nus pa'o //
translated: His mind is attached, means: he is unable to remain even for a moment without it.

original: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgya'i char te grangs su yang mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgya'i char te grangs su yang mi 'gro'o //
translated: It does not approach even a hundredth part, etc. means: it does not even approach a hundredth part, i.e. it does not even approach the number of a hundred.

original: brgya'i sgra ni 'dir mang po nyid nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i don to //üîΩstong gi char yang zhes bya ba ni shin tu mang po nyid nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brgya'i sgra ni 'dir mang po nyid nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i don to // stong gi char yang zhes bya ba ni shin tu mang po nyid nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word hundred here is for the purpose of illustrating the abundance.üîΩIt does not approach even a thousandth part, means: for the purpose of illustrating the great abundance.

original: 'bum gyi char yang zhes bya ba ni rab tu mang po nyid nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bum gyi char yang zhes bya ba ni rab tu mang po nyid nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It does not approach even a hundred-thousandth part, means: for the purpose of illustrating the abundance.

original: grangs su yang zhes bya ba ni drug cu gnas gzhan lhag par gyur pa la yang grangs su nye bar mi 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: grangs su yang zhes bya ba ni drug cu gnas gzhan lhag par gyur pa la yang grangs su nye bar mi 'gro ba'o //
translated: It does not even approach the number, means: it does not even approach the number of sixty more places.

original: char yang zhes bya ba ni grangs kyi cha shas su ste /
analyzed: char yang zhes bya ba ni grangs kyi cha shas su ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù means a part of the number.

original: 'dir cha'i sgra ni cha shas kyi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: 'dir cha'i sgra ni cha shas kyi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúpart‚Äù is a synonym of ‚Äúportion.‚Äù

original: bgrang bar yang zhes bya ba ni don dam pa nyid du brdzus ba ni bgrang ba ste /
analyzed: bgrang bar yang zhes bya ba ni don dam pa nyid du brdzus ba ni bgrang ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù means in the sense of enumeration.

original: spre'u mo 'di ni yang dag pa nyid du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spre'u mo 'di ni yang dag pa nyid du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: This female monkey is not real.

original: punda r'i ka la ltos nas zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: punda r'i ka la ltos nas zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: In relation to Pundarika, up to here.

original: dper yang zhes bya ba ni dpe nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dper yang zhes bya ba ni dpe nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù means in the sense of example.

original: rgyur yang ste /
analyzed: rgyur yang ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù means in the sense of cause.

original: dpe'i rgyu tsam du yang mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dpe'i rgyu tsam du yang mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It does not become merely the cause of an example.

original: rtse ba ni pi wang la sogs pa rol mo'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: rtse ba ni pi wang la sogs pa rol mo'i khyad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPlay‚Äù is a particular kind of music such as a lute.

original: @47b bzhin rab tu dang ba'i phyir dga' ba'o //
analyzed: @47b bzhin rab tu dang ba'i phyir dga' ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJoy‚Äù is due to the clarity of the face.

original: yid kyi bde ba ni nyams su myong ba'i phyir mgu ba'o //
analyzed: yid kyi bde ba ni nyams su myong ba'i phyir mgu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDelight‚Äù is due to the experience of mental pleasure.

original: skad rab tu dang ba'i phyir rangs pa'o //
analyzed: skad rab tu dang ba'i phyir rangs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGladness‚Äù is due to the clarity of speech.

original: shin tu khrel ba ni ngo tsha ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir sems kyis yongs su spang ba nyid du 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu khrel ba ni ngo tsha ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir sems kyis yongs su spang ba nyid du 'dod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúShame‚Äù is the desire to completely abandon the mind due to being a cause of shame.

original: ngo tsha ni ngo tsha bar gyur pas gzhan gyi bzhin la yang blta ba nyid kyi nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo tsha ni ngo tsha bar gyur pas gzhan gyi bzhin la yang blta ba nyid kyi nus pa med pa'o //
translated: Shame is the inability to even look at the faces of others because of shame.

original: rnam par 'dor zhing zhes bya ba ni sems kyis ngo tsha ba'i dngos po yongs su spong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'dor zhing zhes bya ba ni sems kyis ngo tsha ba'i dngos po yongs su spong bar byed pa'o //
translated: One shuns the object of shame by the mind.

original: smod par byed ces bya ba ni yongs su spangs pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid la smod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: smod par byed ces bya ba ni yongs su spangs pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid la smod par byed pa'o //
translated: One condemns oneself after having shunned it.

original: dmyal bas khyab pa'i sa phyogs ma yin pa ni gnas mthon po'o //
analyzed: dmyal bas khyab pa'i sa phyogs ma yin pa ni gnas mthon po'o //
translated: A high place is a place that is not filled with hell beings.

original: phyung ba ni mig go //üîΩbcad pa ni sha'o //
analyzed: phyung ba ni mig go // bcad pa ni sha'o //
translated: The eye is the eye sense faculty.üîΩ The flesh is the flesh of the body.

original: phug pa ni rus pa'o //
analyzed: phug pa ni rus pa'o //
translated: The bones are the bones of the body.

original: mtshon mdung thung la sogs pa ni mtshon cha'i bye brag go //
analyzed: mtshon mdung thung la sogs pa ni mtshon cha'i bye brag go //
translated: The weapons are the various weapons such as swords, spears, and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig cung zad 'bar bar gyur pas na cung zad 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig cung zad 'bar bar gyur pas na cung zad 'bar ba'o //
translated: Since some are burning a little, they are called slightly burning.

original: cung zad 'bar ba de nyid 'phel bar gyur pas na rab tu 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: cung zad 'bar ba de nyid 'phel bar gyur pas na rab tu 'bar ba'o //
translated: Since that slight burning increases, they are called burning.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par 'bar ba nyid kyis na kun nas rab tu 'bar ba nyid do //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par 'bar ba nyid kyis na kun nas rab tu 'bar ba nyid do //
translated: Since they are burning continuously, they are called completely burning.üîΩ üîΩThe great hell of Avƒ´ci is the great hell of uninterrupted suffering.

original: 'bar ba de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur pas na gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur pas na gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa'o //
translated: All of those flames are combined into one, and so they become one great flame.

original: skrag pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po ma yin par thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skrag pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po ma yin par thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Fear is the arising of a mind that is frightened by hearing about something that is not desirable.

original: skyo ba zhes bya ba ni sems skyo ba dang ldan pa skye bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba zhes bya ba ni sems skyo ba dang ldan pa skye bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Discouragement is the arising of a mind that is weary.

original: ba spu ldang ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi spu ldang bar gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ba spu ldang ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi spu ldang bar gyur ba'o //
translated: The hairs on the body stand on end is the arising of the hairs on the body.

original: dman pa ni zhum pa'o //
analyzed: dman pa ni zhum pa'o //
translated: Inferiority is depression.

original: zhen pa ni skyo bar gyur pas bag 'khums pa ste du ba nyid du 'don pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhen pa ni skyo bar gyur pas bag 'khums pa ste du ba nyid du 'don pa lta bu'o //
translated: Attachment is the contraction of the mind due to discouragement, like a person who is exhausted.

original: smon pas zhes bya ba ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don nges pa'o //
analyzed: smon pas zhes bya ba ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don nges pa'o //
translated: Aspiration is the desire for a result, such as rebirth in the higher realms.

original: tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag la mchod pa yin te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag la mchod pa yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúvenerable UpaÃÑli‚Äù is an expression of respect for those who have entered the teaching of the TathƒÅgata.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i tshe dang ldan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i tshe dang ldan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he is venerable, in the sense of being worthy of honor.

original: thog mar zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus yin la /
analyzed: thog mar zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i dus yin la /
translated: First is the time of taking up.

original: dge ba zhes bya ba ni bzang po ste /
analyzed: dge ba zhes bya ba ni bzang po ste /
translated: Virtuous means good,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from any fault.

original: bar du zhes bya ba ni sems pa'i gnas skabs su'o //
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba ni sems pa'i gnas skabs su'o //
translated: In the middle is the time of intention.

original: tha mar zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i gnas skabs su'o //
analyzed: tha mar zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i gnas skabs su'o //
translated: In the end is the time of cultivation.

original: don bzang po zhes bya ba ni don phyin ci ma log pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don bzang po zhes bya ba ni don phyin ci ma log pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Good meaning means having an unmistaken meaning.

original: tshig 'bru bzang po zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i sgra dang ldan @48a * //üîΩpa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig 'bru bzang po zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i sgra dang ldan @48a * // pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Good phrasing means having a sound that accomplishes that.üîΩIt is said to have a special purpose in the statement,

original: 'di khyad par du 'phags pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa nyid du gsungs pa ni ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di khyad par du 'phags pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa nyid du gsungs pa ni ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: unmixed, and so on.

original: ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed pa la theg pa chen po la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa ste /
analyzed: ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed pa la theg pa chen po la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa ste /
translated: Unmixed means unadulterated, because it is not dependent on the Great Vehicle for the reversal of all suffering.

original: tshangs par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa'o //
translated: It is pure living.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa ni ral pa med pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa ni ral pa med pa ste /
translated: The fully developed is the one without a tuft,

original: 'bras bu ma lus pa sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma lus pa sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it brings about the accomplishment of all the fruits.

original: yongs su dag pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The purified is the one free from the stain of the defilements.

original: yongs su byang ba ni yang srid par 'byung ba'i las spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su byang ba ni yang srid par 'byung ba'i las spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cleansed is the one that has eliminated the karma that leads to rebirth.

original: 'di'i ming gang zhe na /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di'i ming gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the name of this?üîΩIt is called

original: mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
analyzed: mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
translated: the entry into the womb.

original: shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig ces bya ba'i tshig gsum po de dag ni nyan pa po'i sems bskyed pa'i bye brag la rnam par sbyar ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig ces bya ba'i tshig gsum po de dag ni nyan pa po'i sems bskyed pa'i bye brag la rnam par sbyar ba'i phyir te /
translated: The three words ‚Äúlisten well, keep it in mind‚Äù are applied to the different states of mind of the listeners.

original: nyan pa po kha cig ni snod kha spub pa lta bu yod la /üîΩkha cig ni snod zhabs rdol lta bu yod cing /
analyzed: nyan pa po kha cig ni snod kha spub pa lta bu yod la / kha cig ni snod zhabs rdol lta bu yod cing /
translated: Some listeners are like overturned vessels,üîΩsome are like leaky vessels,

original: kha cig ni snod mi gtsang ba lta bu yod do //
analyzed: kha cig ni snod mi gtsang ba lta bu yod do //
translated: and some are like dirty vessels.

original: kha spu ba la chu mi 'jug la /
analyzed: kha spu ba la chu mi 'jug la /
translated: Water does not remain in an overturned vessel,

original: rdol ba la 'jug kyang gnas par mi 'gyur zhing mi gtsang ba la 'jug cing gnas kyang btung bar bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'ga' zhig gis yid la chos bshad par gyur pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdol ba la 'jug kyang gnas par mi 'gyur zhing mi gtsang ba la 'jug cing gnas kyang btung bar bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'ga' zhig gis yid la chos bshad par gyur pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Just so, some people do not take up the Dharma teaching,

original: rtse gcig tu nyan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtse gcig tu nyan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not listen with one-pointed attention.

original: 'ga' zhig la rab tu 'jug kyang gnas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la rab tu 'jug kyang gnas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Some take it up, but do not retain it,

original: brjed ngas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjed ngas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are forgetful.

original: 'ga' zhig la rab tu 'jug cing gnas su zin kyang log pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la rab tu 'jug cing gnas su zin kyang log pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: Some take it up and retain it, but hold it wrongly,

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i dbang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i dbang gi phyir ro //
translated: because they misunderstand it.

original: de ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis snod kha spub pa la sogs pa'i dpes sems gsum po dag las dge slong dag rnam par bzlog cing kha yar blta ba dang sra ba dang gtsang ba'i snod kyi dpe can gyi sems la nges par sbyar ba yin te //
analyzed: de ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis snod kha spub pa la sogs pa'i dpes sems gsum po dag las dge slong dag rnam par bzlog cing kha yar blta ba dang sra ba dang gtsang ba'i snod kyi dpe can gyi sems la nges par sbyar ba yin te //
translated: The Blessed One has said that these three kinds of people are like the overturned, the pierced, and the broken vessels, and that they are to be avoided. He has said that the Dharma should be taught to those who are like the upright, the undamaged, and the clean vessels.

original: legs par zung shig shin tu zung shig / yid la zung shig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: legs par zung shig shin tu zung shig / yid la zung shig ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHold it well, hold it very well, hold it in mind!‚Äù

original: legs par nyan pa ni rtse gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs par nyan pa ni rtse gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHold it well‚Äù means to hold it with one-pointedness.

original: shin tu nyan pa ni brjed ngas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu nyan pa ni brjed ngas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHold it very well‚Äù means to hold it without forgetfulness.

original: yid la zung shig pa @48b ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid la zung shig pa @48b ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHold it in mind‚Äù means to hold it in proper mental attention.

original: chags pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas spyod pa mngon sum du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas spyod pa mngon sum du gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAttachment‚Äù means the occurrence of lust.

original: 'dus par gyur pa na zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa spyod du rung ba'i gnas skabs rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus par gyur pa na zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa spyod du rung ba'i gnas skabs rnyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen they come together‚Äù means when the opportunity for sexual intercourse is present.

original: dge ba nyid ni nad med pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba nyid ni nad med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHealth‚Äù means freedom from illness.

original: zla mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mngal 'dzin par rung ba'o //
analyzed: zla mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mngal 'dzin par rung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving a menstrual period‚Äù means being able to conceive.

original: 'jug par 'dod pa ni mngal du rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug par 'dod pa ni mngal du rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDesire to enter‚Äù means the desire to enter the womb.

original: zhag gsum ni nyi ma gsum gyi mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: zhag gsum ni nyi ma gsum gyi mthar thug pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThree days‚Äù means up to three days.

original: zhag lnga dang zhag bdun yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: zhag lnga dang zhag bdun yang de bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúFive days‚Äù and ‚Äúseven days‚Äù are similar.

original: rgyu ni nang gi yan lag dang gtso bo'i byed rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni nang gi yan lag dang gtso bo'i byed rgyu'o //
translated: The cause is the internal factor and the primary factor.

original: rkyen ni phyi'i yan lag dang gtso bo ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen ni phyi'i yan lag dang gtso bo ma yin pa'o //
translated: The condition is the external factor and the secondary factor.

original: zla mtshan dang zla mtshan du yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gcig ma rdzogs par zla mtshan gzhan 'byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zla mtshan dang zla mtshan du yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gcig ma rdzogs par zla mtshan gzhan 'byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The menstrual flow and the menstrual blood are connected. This means that when one is not complete, another arises.

original: nyes pas bcom pa ni mdangs dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir skyes bu mi 'dod pa de bas na rtag tu de'i sems skyo bas gnas par 'gyur zhing sems 'khrug pa'i phyir mngal 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyes pas bcom pa ni mdangs dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir skyes bu mi 'dod pa de bas na rtag tu de'i sems skyo bas gnas par 'gyur zhing sems 'khrug pa'i phyir mngal 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is destroyed by faults is not desired by men because of lack of luster. Therefore, his mind always abides in sorrow and does not conceive the womb because of mental disturbance.

original: nye bar gdungs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag po mtshungs pa'i phrag dog la sogs pas so //
analyzed: nye bar gdungs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag po mtshungs pa'i phrag dog la sogs pas so //
translated: The one who is tormented means the one who is jealous of the equal or superior.

original: myur du zad cing zhes bya ba ni khrag gi lhag ma dang bshang ba dang gci ba 'grib pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: myur du zad cing zhes bya ba ni khrag gi lhag ma dang bshang ba dang gci ba 'grib pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Quickly exhausted means because of the decrease of the remaining blood, feces, and urine.

original: yongs su dengs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad du yongs su zad par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su dengs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad du yongs su zad par gyur pa'o //
translated: Completely disappears means it all becomes exhausted.

original: bde ba mang pos zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bde ba nyid de //
analyzed: bde ba mang pos zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bde ba nyid de //
translated: By with many joys is meant that it is always joyful,

original: phrag dog la sogs pas nye bar ma gdungs pa'o //
analyzed: phrag dog la sogs pas nye bar ma gdungs pa'o //
translated: not tormented by envy, etc.

original: pha ma dag par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi nyes pas so //
analyzed: pha ma dag par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi nyes pas so //
translated: By with pure parents is meant that there is no defect in the seed.

original: skye gnas zhes bya ba mngal gyi gnas so //
analyzed: skye gnas zhes bya ba mngal gyi gnas so //
translated: By womb is meant the place of the womb.

original: rlung la sogs pas nye bar gnod par gyur pa ni rlung la sogs pa gang gis de bzhin du rung tha ma yin pa 'di la mngal gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩkhrag gis nye bar gnod pa ni khrag gis khyab par gyur pa 'am /
analyzed: rlung la sogs pas nye bar gnod par gyur pa ni rlung la sogs pa gang gis de bzhin du rung tha ma yin pa 'di la mngal gnas par mi 'gyur ro // khrag gis nye bar gnod pa ni khrag gis khyab par gyur pa 'am /
translated: By not harmed by wind, etc. is meant that it is not fit to be a womb because of wind, etc.üîΩBy harmed by blood is meant that it is filled with blood,

original: tshil gyis khyab par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: tshil gyis khyab par gyur pa'o //
translated: or filled with fat.

original: mtshams ni sa bon 'jug pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: mtshams ni sa bon 'jug pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: The junction is the place where the seed enters.

original: gal te shas khengs par gyur na de la sa bon zhugs par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩtsha bar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni skye gnas gang la tsha ba ste /
analyzed: gal te shas khengs par gyur na de la sa bon zhugs par mi 'gyur ro // tsha bar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni skye gnas gang la tsha ba ste /
translated: If it is filled with phlegm, the seed will not enter there.üîΩBy abiding in heat is meant that the womb has the power to burn,

original: tshig par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan ba ste /
analyzed: tshig par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan ba ste /
translated: to consume.

original: sa bon zhugs ma thag tu skam pa'i phyir ram /üîΩyang na sman gyis @49a * //
analyzed: sa bon zhugs ma thag tu skam pa'i phyir ram / yang na sman gyis @49a * //
translated: because the seed is immediately dried up,üîΩor because it is rendered unfit by a substance,

original: te rdzas kyi bye brag gis mi rung ba nyid du bsgrubs pa'o //üîΩdbus nas 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni ci ltar nas 'bru'i mtha' gnyis zhum la dbus rgyas pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: te rdzas kyi bye brag gis mi rung ba nyid du bsgrubs pa'o // dbus nas 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni ci ltar nas 'bru'i mtha' gnyis zhum la dbus rgyas pa lta bu'o //
translated: such as a medicine.üîΩLike a rice grain means like a rice grain whose two ends are shriveled and its middle is full.

original: dbus grog ma 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grog ma'i rked pa phra la mgo dang mjug ma rgya che ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbus grog ma 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grog ma'i rked pa phra la mgo dang mjug ma rgya che ba lta bu'o //
translated: Like an ant means like an ant whose waist is thin and whose head and rear are large.

original: rnga mo'i mchu lta bu zhes bya ba ni rnga mo'i mchu dang 'dra bar gal te mtha' lhod par gyur na'o //
analyzed: rnga mo'i mchu lta bu zhes bya ba ni rnga mo'i mchu dang 'dra bar gal te mtha' lhod par gyur na'o //
translated: Like a camel‚Äôs mouth means like a camel‚Äôs mouth, if its ends are loose.

original: shing n+ya gro dha'i myu gu kha 'bus pa lta bu zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shing n+ya gro dha'i myu gu kha 'bus pa lta bu zhes bya ba la /
translated: Like a newly sprouted nyagrodha tree means

original: shing n+ya gro dha'i lo ma sar pa 'byung ba'i tshe ras bal gyi sa bon gyi rnam pa lta bur rnam pa lta bur rnam par gyur ba la myu gu zhes tha snyad du btags pa yin te /
analyzed: shing n+ya gro dha'i lo ma sar pa 'byung ba'i tshe ras bal gyi sa bon gyi rnam pa lta bur rnam pa lta bur rnam par gyur ba la myu gu zhes tha snyad du btags pa yin te /
translated: when a new leaf of a nyagrodha tree appears, it is called a sprout, like the form of a cotton seed.

original: gal te de'i rnam pa lta bu'i shing dum bu skye gnas kyi sgor skyes par gyur na'o //
analyzed: gal te de'i rnam pa lta bu'i shing dum bu skye gnas kyi sgor skyes par gyur na'o //
translated: If it were to be born in the form of a piece of wood, like a ploughshare.

original: gshol mda'i lta bu zhes bya ba la gshol mda' ni gshol la btags pa'i shing ste /
analyzed: gshol mda'i lta bu zhes bya ba la gshol mda' ni gshol la btags pa'i shing ste /
translated: Like a ploughshare means like a piece of wood attached to a plough.

original: gal te gshol mda' dang 'dra ba'i sha dbyibs ring po can skye gnas kyi sgo'i nang du skyes shing byung bar gyur na'o //
analyzed: gal te gshol mda' dang 'dra ba'i sha dbyibs ring po can skye gnas kyi sgo'i nang du skyes shing byung bar gyur na'o //
translated: If it were to be born in the form of a long piece of meat like a ploughshare, inside the door of the birth site.

original: shing rta'i rtsibs lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar shing rta'i logs gsum yongs la gcig dog pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: shing rta'i rtsibs lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar shing rta'i logs gsum yongs la gcig dog pa lta bu'o //
translated: Like a chariot wheel means like the three sides of a chariot, one side being narrow.

original: sba lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sba'i lcug ma 'og gi cha sbom la de nas rim gyi phral ji srid rtse mo'i cha shin tu phra ba ltar gal te skye gnas de'i rnam pa de lta bur gyur na'o //
analyzed: sba lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sba'i lcug ma 'og gi cha sbom la de nas rim gyi phral ji srid rtse mo'i cha shin tu phra ba ltar gal te skye gnas de'i rnam pa de lta bur gyur na'o //
translated: Like a reed means like a reed, the lower part being thick and then gradually thinner, until the tip is very thin. If the birth site were to be like that.

original: lo ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni gal te pi pi ling gi shing la sogs pa'i lo ma'i rnam pa lta bur gyur na'o //
analyzed: lo ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni gal te pi pi ling gi shing la sogs pa'i lo ma'i rnam pa lta bur gyur na'o //
translated: Like a leaf means if it were to be like the leaf of a pippala tree and so on.

original: nang du mdzer pa skyes pa zhes bya ba ni gal te nang gi logs su sha'i mdzer ba skyes par gyur na'o //üîΩ'og tu zab pa zhes bya ba ni cha shin tu zab pa'o //
analyzed: nang du mdzer pa skyes pa zhes bya ba ni gal te nang gi logs su sha'i mdzer ba skyes par gyur na'o // 'og tu zab pa zhes bya ba ni cha shin tu zab pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAn internal growth‚Äù means that a growth has arisen inside the vagina.üîΩ‚ÄúDeep‚Äù means very deep.

original: steng zab pa zhes bya ba ni steng gi cha shin tu yangs pa'o //
analyzed: steng zab pa zhes bya ba ni steng gi cha shin tu yangs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúShallow‚Äù means very shallow.

original: sa bon gyi snod du mi rung ba zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sa bon 'dzin pa'i nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon gyi snod du mi rung ba zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sa bon 'dzin pa'i nus pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnfit to be a womb‚Äù means that by nature it is unable to hold a seed.

original: khrag 'dzag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag tu 'dzag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: khrag 'dzag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag tu 'dzag par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways leaking‚Äù means that it always leaks.

original: chung ngu zhes bya ba ni dog pa'o //
analyzed: chung ngu zhes bya ba ni dog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSmall‚Äù means narrow.

original: bya rog gi mchu lta bu zhes bya ba ni sgo bya rog gi mchu'i rnam pa lta bu'o //üîΩg-yon du yangs pa ni g-yas su dog pa'o //
analyzed: bya rog gi mchu lta bu zhes bya ba ni sgo bya rog gi mchu'i rnam pa lta bu'o // g-yon du yangs pa ni g-yas su dog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLike a crow‚Äôs beak‚Äù means that the opening is like a crow‚Äôs beak.üîΩ‚ÄúWide on the left‚Äù means narrow on the right.

original: g-yas su yangs pa ni g-yon du dog pa'o //üîΩsteng yangs pa ni 'og tu dog pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas su yangs pa ni g-yon du dog pa'o // steng yangs pa ni 'og tu dog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWide on the right‚Äù means narrow on the left.üîΩ‚ÄúWide above‚Äù means narrow below.

original: 'og tu yangs pa zhes bya ba ni steng du dog pa'o //
analyzed: 'og tu yangs pa zhes bya ba ni steng du dog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNarrow above‚Äù means wide below.

original: mtho ba zhes bya ba ni nang gi skabs su sha'i lhag chags par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mtho ba zhes bya ba ni nang gi skabs su sha'i lhag chags par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúElevated‚Äù means that the womb is elevated inside.

original: dma' ba zhes bya ba ni nang nye bar mtshon par byed @49b pa'o //
analyzed: dma' ba zhes bya ba ni nang nye bar mtshon par byed @49b pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDepressed‚Äù means that the womb is low inside.

original: 'og tu sgur bar zhes bya ba ni kha 'og tu bltas pa'o //
analyzed: 'og tu sgur bar zhes bya ba ni kha 'og tu bltas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBent down‚Äù means that the womb is facing downward.

original: mtshan ma tsam zhes bya ba ni tshad chung ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma tsam zhes bya ba ni tshad chung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSmall‚Äù means that the womb is small.

original: yo ba zhes bya ba ni sa bon 'jug pa'i phyogs 'khyog pa'o //üîΩnyes pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i nyes pa ma gtogs pa'i nyes pa dang ngo //üîΩska ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni ska ba'i rdzas kyi btung bas rung ba ma yin pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yo ba zhes bya ba ni sa bon 'jug pa'i phyogs 'khyog pa'o // nyes pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i nyes pa ma gtogs pa'i nyes pa dang ngo // ska ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni ska ba'i rdzas kyi btung bas rung ba ma yin pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTwisted‚Äù means that the womb is twisted, not straight.üîΩ‚ÄúDefective‚Äù means that the womb has the defects just mentioned.üîΩ‚ÄúRough‚Äù means that the womb is rough, like a rough cloth.

original: srin bu be sa ra ka'i rigs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: srin bu be sa ra ka'i rigs zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚ÄúWith worms‚Äù means that the womb is the home of many worms.

original: gal te des skye gnas zos par gyur pa na ste /
analyzed: gal te des skye gnas zos par gyur pa na ste /
translated: If the embryo eats the womb,

original: bshad ma thag pa'i nyes pa de dag gis gal te skye gnas nyams par ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i nyes pa de dag gis gal te skye gnas nyams par ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: if the womb is not defective because of the defects just mentioned,

original: mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enter the womb.

original: bsod nams chen po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bsod nams chen po zhes bya ba la /
translated: Great merit.

original: khyed la bdag po chen po zhes brjod pa'i rnam pa de dang ldan pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam pa dang rgya che ba la mos pa'i phyir bdag po chen po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khyed la bdag po chen po zhes brjod pa'i rnam pa de dang ldan pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam pa dang rgya che ba la mos pa'i phyir bdag po chen po zhes bya ste /
translated: He is called a great lord because he has the aspect of being called a great lord, and because he is especially exalted and has a vast aspiration.

original: bdag nyid chen por grags pa yin la /
analyzed: bdag nyid chen por grags pa yin la /
translated: He is renowned as a great being.

original: gtso bo chen po'i blo ci 'dra bar grags pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: gtso bo chen po'i blo ci 'dra bar grags pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: He is called that because he has the kind of mind that is renowned as a great chief.

original: de la bsod nams chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la bsod nams chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called great merit.

original: de bzhin du bdag po chung ba zhes grags pa yang rnam par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag po chung ba zhes grags pa yang rnam par bshad par bya ste /
translated: Similarly, one should explain the one who is renowned as a small lord.

original: bsod nams chung ba'o //
analyzed: bsod nams chung ba'o //
translated: He has little merit.

original: bu rnyed pa ste so sor dmigs shing de bsags pa ni skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bu thob pa'i las byas shing bsags pa'o //
analyzed: bu rnyed pa ste so sor dmigs shing de bsags pa ni skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bu thob pa'i las byas shing bsags pa'o //
translated: He has obtained a son, he has individually perceived and accumulated that, he has created and accumulated the karma of obtaining a son.

original: skyes pa la sems pa zhes bya ba ni bdag skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa de'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe pha khong khro ba skye bar 'gyur la ma ni rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes pa la sems pa zhes bya ba ni bdag skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa de'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe pha khong khro ba skye bar 'gyur la ma ni rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
translated: The father is angry and the mother is attached when the child thinks, I am a male, and the child generates the mind of a male.

original: bud med la sems pa zhes bya ba ni bdag ni bud med do zhes bya ba de lta bu de'i tshe ma zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur la pha ni rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bud med la sems pa zhes bya ba ni bdag ni bud med do zhes bya ba de lta bu de'i tshe ma zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur la pha ni rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
translated: The mother is angry and the father is attached when the child thinks, I am a female.

original: log pa ste phyin ci log gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gang la yod pa de ni phyin ci log gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal te dri za'o //
analyzed: log pa ste phyin ci log gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gang la yod pa de ni phyin ci log gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal te dri za'o //
translated: The Gandharva who possesses distorted pride is one who possesses distorted pride that is distorted in relation to the self.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa ste phyin ci log gi 'du shes bcu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa ste phyin ci log gi 'du shes bcu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: It obtains ten distorted perceptions that are distorted in relation to the self.

original: char babs pas nyin mo kun du spyod par dga' bas na yul rmugs pa'o //
analyzed: char babs pas nyin mo kun du spyod par dga' bas na yul rmugs pa'o //
translated: The land is muddy because it is pleasant to play in the rain.

original: byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / thob pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin la /
analyzed: byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / thob pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin la /
translated: The terms birth, origination and attainment are synonyms.

original: yang na snga na med pa skad cig ma dang po la thob pa ni skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: yang na snga na med pa skad cig ma dang po la thob pa ni skyes pa yin te /
translated: Or else, that which is obtained in the first moment, which did not exist previously, is origination.

original: so sor thob pa yin la /
analyzed: so sor thob pa yin la /
translated: That which is obtained individually is origination.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa la thob pa @50a * //
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa la thob pa @50a * //
translated: That which is obtained in the second moment and so on is duration.

original: zhes bya'o // nang nas skyes par gyur na skye ba ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // nang nas skyes par gyur na skye ba ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: When it arises internally, it is origination.

original: rang gi sems la rag lus pa'i sgo nas skyes pa na'o //üîΩrtsig pa'i bu gu ni rtsig pa'i ser ga'o //
analyzed: rang gi sems la rag lus pa'i sgo nas skyes pa na'o // rtsig pa'i bu gu ni rtsig pa'i ser ga'o //
translated: It arises in dependence on one‚Äôs own mind.üîΩA hole in a wall is a crack in a wall.

original: rtsig pa'i drung ni rtsig pa'i rtsa ba'o //üîΩrab tu 'jug pa tsam gyi sgo nas dmigs pa tsam mo //
analyzed: rtsig pa'i drung ni rtsig pa'i rtsa ba'o // rab tu 'jug pa tsam gyi sgo nas dmigs pa tsam mo //
translated: The foot of a wall is the base of a wall.üîΩThe mere object is the mere object of engagement.

original: rjes su 'jug pa yin pas na brten pa tsam mo //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa yin pas na brten pa tsam mo //
translated: The mere support is the mere support of engagement.

original: rtsva sngon po las srin bu gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni rtsva sngon po'i rkyen ma gtogs par srin bu mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtsva sngon po las srin bu gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni rtsva sngon po'i rkyen ma gtogs par srin bu mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The worm is not born from anything other than the blue-green plant, that is, the worm is not born without the blue-green plant as a condition.

original: phra ba'i phyir mngon par nyams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: phra ba'i phyir mngon par nyams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is said to be subtle because it is imperceptible, that is, it is imperceptible because it is subtle.

original: rnam par brtan pa ni brtan ba nyid du skyes par gyur pa'o//üîΩ'phel ba ni ring po nyid du 'phel bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par brtan pa ni brtan ba nyid du skyes par gyur pa'o// 'phel ba ni ring po nyid du 'phel bar gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFirmly established‚Äù means that it is born with firmness.üîΩ‚ÄúIncreased‚Äù means that it increases in size.

original: skye ba ni zheng nyid du rgyas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni zheng nyid du rgyas par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExpanded‚Äù means that it expands in breadth.

original: nye bar 'gro bar zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa thag nye bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'gro bar zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa thag nye bar gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúApproaching‚Äù means that consciousness is approaching.

original: nye bar bzung ba zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyis nye bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar bzung ba zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyis nye bar bzung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSeized‚Äù means that it is seized by the mind and mental factors through their power.

original: khur ba mkhan mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni khur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: khur ba mkhan mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni khur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSkilled in the various arts‚Äù means that it is skilled in the various arts.

original: khur ba mkhan gyi slob ma zhes bya ba ni bzo'i slob dpon dang mtshungs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: khur ba mkhan gyi slob ma zhes bya ba ni bzo'i slob dpon dang mtshungs par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAn apprentice to the artist‚Äù means that it is like an apprentice to the artist.

original: las des ma yin zhes bya ba ni las gang gis khu ba dang khrag skyed par byed pa de nyid kyis mer mer por skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: las des ma yin zhes bya ba ni las gang gis khu ba dang khrag skyed par byed pa de nyid kyis mer mer por skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot by that action‚Äù means that the action by which the semen and blood are generated is not the same action by which the kalala is generated.

original: rgyu des ma yin zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang khrag skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dag gis so //
analyzed: rgyu des ma yin zhes bya ba ni khu ba dang khrag skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dag gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot by that cause‚Äù means not by the causes that generate semen and blood.

original: rgyu 'dus shing zhes bya ba ni rgyu gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'dus shing zhes bya ba ni rgyu gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe coming together of causes‚Äù means the coming together of causes as one.

original: tshogs pa ni 'bras bu skyed par rjes su mthun pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa ni 'bras bu skyed par rjes su mthun pa nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe assemblage‚Äù means the conformity to the production of the effect.

original: 'du bas na zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu thams cad skyed pa'i bya ba byed par mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: 'du bas na zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu thams cad skyed pa'i bya ba byed par mtshungs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe union‚Äù means the similarity in the performance of the action of producing all the effects.

original: rgyu rnam pa gsum po de dag mngon sum du gyur pa las mngal rab tu 'chags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu rnam pa gsum po de dag mngon sum du gyur pa las mngal rab tu 'chags par 'gyur ro //
translated: From the manifestation of these three kinds of causes, the womb becomes fully developed.

original: phyogs gcig ma grugs pa'i phyir ma chag pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs gcig ma grugs pa'i phyir ma chag pa'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúnot broken‚Äù because one part is not broken off.

original: dud 'gro dang srog chags kyis ma zos pa'i phyir dum bur ma gyur pa'o /
analyzed: dud 'gro dang srog chags kyis ma zos pa'i phyir dum bur ma gyur pa'o /
translated: It is ‚Äúnot torn‚Äù because it is not eaten by animals and insects.

original: khug pa ring po med pa'i phyir bu gu ma byung ba'o //
analyzed: khug pa ring po med pa'i phyir bu gu ma byung ba'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúnot perforated‚Äù because it is not perforated by worms.

original: chu la sogs pas nyams par gyur pa ni ma rul ba'o //
analyzed: chu la sogs pas nyams par gyur pa ni ma rul ba'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúnot rotten‚Äù because it is not damaged by water, etc.

original: rlung dang nyi ma dag gis nus pa chung ba nyid du ma bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rlung dang nyi ma dag gis nus pa chung ba nyid du ma bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: It is ‚Äúnot dried out‚Äù because it is not dried out by wind and sun.

original: rlung dang nyi mas nyams par ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang nyi mas nyams par ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is not damaged by wind or sun.

original: lo gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sar ba'o //
analyzed: lo gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sar ba'o //
translated: It is fresh because it is only one year old.

original: nang gi snying po dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir @50b mkhregs pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi snying po dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir @50b mkhregs pa'o //
translated: It is hard because it has an inner core.

original: dus mi bzad pas rjes su gnod par ma gyur pa nyid kyi phyir bde ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: dus mi bzad pas rjes su gnod par ma gyur pa nyid kyi phyir bde ba'i gnas so //
translated: It is a pleasant place to stay because it is not harmed by the worst of the seasons.

original: me yongs su dbyung bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni byed par 'dod pa 'am skyed pa nyid du 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: me yongs su dbyung bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni byed par 'dod pa 'am skyed pa nyid du 'dod pa'o //
translated: The desire to light a fire means the desire to make it or the desire to produce it.

original: kun du bstan zhes bya ba ni gtad pa'o //
analyzed: kun du bstan zhes bya ba ni gtad pa'o //
translated: To set it out means to put it in place.

original: de las skyes pa zhes bya ba la gzugs de la brten nas skyes pa ni de las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de las skyes pa zhes bya ba la gzugs de la brten nas skyes pa ni de las skyes pa ste /
translated: That which is produced from it is produced from that.

original: ming la brten pa'i gzugs dang / gzugs la brten pa'i ming zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ming la brten pa'i gzugs dang / gzugs la brten pa'i ming zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called form based on name and name based on form.

original: gzugs 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba la 'byung ba ni skye ba yin la /
analyzed: gzugs 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba la 'byung ba ni skye ba yin la /
translated: The arising of form, etc. means that arising is birth.

original: gnas pa ni skad cig ma tsam gyi gnas skabs yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa ni skad cig ma tsam gyi gnas skabs yin no //
translated: Abiding is the state of lasting for just a moment.

original: mngon par 'phel ba ni bar mdo nyid du 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: mngon par 'phel ba ni bar mdo nyid du 'byung ba yin la /
translated: The increase of the embryo is in the middle period.

original: skye ba ni sngon gyi dus kyi dngos po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: skye ba ni sngon gyi dus kyi dngos po'i sgo nas so //
translated: The birth is in the later period.

original: zug rngu dang 'dra bar gdung bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mngal kho na zug rngu yin la /
analyzed: zug rngu dang 'dra bar gdung bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mngal kho na zug rngu yin la /
translated: The womb is like a wound because it is painful.

original: 'bar 'bur dang snod mi gtsang bas gang ba'i nang du song bas lus kyi dbang po ma lus pa de gdungs shing bsregs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar 'bur dang snod mi gtsang bas gang ba'i nang du song bas lus kyi dbang po ma lus pa de gdungs shing bsregs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The body sense-faculty is burned and scorched by the embryo which is in the womb, which is like a wound, and which is like a burning, festering sore.

original: rgal dka' ba nyid kyi phyir nyam nga ba'o //
analyzed: rgal dka' ba nyid kyi phyir nyam nga ba'o //
translated: It is dangerous because it is difficult to get out of.

original: 'jug par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir dog pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir dog pa'o //
translated: It is narrow because it is difficult to enter.

original: gnod pa byed pa nyid kyi phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa nyid kyi phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: It is painful because it causes harm.

original: sdug bsngal gyi ro 'ba' zhig pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba der phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi ro 'ba' zhig pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba der phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The consciousness is of the nature of only suffering means that the consciousness is directed toward the experience of only suffering.

original: 'bras kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni chu la 'bras btsos pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'bras kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni chu la 'bras btsos pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like rice soup means that it is like rice cooked in water.

original: btsos pa ni brlan pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: btsos pa ni brlan pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Cooked means experiencing the suffering of moist heat.

original: rab tu btsos pa ni rgyun gyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: rab tu btsos pa ni rgyun gyi sgo nas so //
translated: Well cooked means by continuity.

original: smin pa ni bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: smin pa ni bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin la /
translated: Ripened means experiencing the suffering of burning.

original: kun du smin pa ni rgyun gyi sgo nas yin zhing /
analyzed: kun du smin pa ni rgyun gyi sgo nas yin zhing /
translated: Fully ripened means by continuity.

original: yongs su smin pa ni khyad par du gyur pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: yongs su smin pa ni khyad par du gyur pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Well ripened means by distinction.

original: ri dags sha ra bha'i rkang pa lta bu can gyi srin bu dmar po can phra mo la zangs kyi thur ma phra mo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ri dags sha ra bha'i rkang pa lta bu can gyi srin bu dmar po can phra mo la zangs kyi thur ma phra mo zhes bya'o //
translated: The small worm with copper-colored feet is called the copper needle.

original: tho ba lta bu ni mdzub gang ba'i tshad de /
analyzed: tho ba lta bu ni mdzub gang ba'i tshad de /
translated: The hammer is one cubit in size.

original: rdo'i bye brag yin te /
analyzed: rdo'i bye brag yin te /
translated: It is a type of stone.

original: gzong bu bsnun pa'i rdo zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: gzong bu bsnun pa'i rdo zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called the stone for striking the chisel.

original: bdar lta bu zhes bya ba ni gang du mtshon cha bdar bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdar lta bu zhes bya ba ni gang du mtshon cha bdar bar byed pa'o //
translated: The whetstone is where the knife is sharpened.

original: shing gi sdong bu zhes bya ba ni myu gu 'byung ba'i phyogs yin la myu gu ni la 'bus pa'o //
analyzed: shing gi sdong bu zhes bya ba ni myu gu 'byung ba'i phyogs yin la myu gu ni la 'bus pa'o //
translated: The tree trunk is the place where the sprout arises, and the sprout is the shoot.

original: lag pa'i dra ba nas dpung ba'i rtsa ba'i 'og la dpung ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lag pa'i dra ba nas dpung ba'i rtsa ba'i 'og la dpung ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúarm‚Äù is the part of the body between the armpit and the elbow.

original: rtsa d'ur ba'i myu gu ni rtsa d'ur ba'i ljang bu'o //
analyzed: rtsa d'ur ba'i myu gu ni rtsa d'ur ba'i ljang bu'o //
translated: The ‚Äútendon of the heel‚Äù is the tendon of the heel.

original: lag ngar ni lag pa'i mthil la bya'o //üîΩ'og ma zhes bya @51a * //
analyzed: lag ngar ni lag pa'i mthil la bya'o // 'og ma zhes bya @51a * //
translated: The ‚Äúforearm‚Äù is the part of the hand between the wrist and the fingers.

original: ba ni 'og tu 'gro ba'i phyir mtshan ma phra mo 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: ba ni 'og tu 'gro ba'i phyir mtshan ma phra mo 'dod pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúlower part‚Äù is the part of the body below the navel.üîΩThe ‚Äúsubtle sign‚Äù is the subtle part of the body.

original: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni 'phel bar byed pa'o //üîΩkun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni 'phel bar byed pa'o // kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo expand‚Äù means to increase.üîΩ‚ÄúTo expand completely‚Äù means to expand in a particular way.

original: yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu khyad par can du'o //
analyzed: yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu khyad par can du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo expand fully‚Äù means to expand in an excellent way.

original: rkyal pa ni ra lpags las bsgrubs pa'i chu rgal ba'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rkyal pa ni ra lpags las bsgrubs pa'i chu rgal ba'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: A ‚Äúraft‚Äù is a means of crossing water made of animal hides.

original: snod gang ba zhes bya ba ni gos la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis yongs su bkang ba ste /
analyzed: snod gang ba zhes bya ba ni gos la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis yongs su bkang ba ste /
translated: A ‚Äúfull vessel‚Äù is a vessel filled with goods such as cloth, etc.

original: rkyal bu la sogs pa'i snod do //
analyzed: rkyal bu la sogs pa'i snod do //
translated: It is a vessel such as a bag, etc.

original: bskyod pa dang / kun du bskyod pa dang / kun du yongs su bskyod pa ni las su byas pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'o //
analyzed: bskyod pa dang / kun du bskyod pa dang / kun du yongs su bskyod pa ni las su byas pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'o //
