original: rtsol ba chen po dang ldan pa ni dka' ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba chen po dang ldan pa ni dka' ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with great effort‚Äù means ‚Äúendowed with great difficulty.‚Äù

original: mgar ba'i sbud pa ni gang gis 'bud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mgar ba'i sbud pa ni gang gis 'bud par byed pa'o //
translated: The bellows of a blacksmith is that by which one blows.

original: g-yo'o zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar gyur pa'o //üîΩnang rol ni tshang che ba yin la /
analyzed: g-yo'o zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar gyur pa'o // nang rol ni tshang che ba yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúIt moves‚Äù means it becomes active.üîΩThe inside is hollow.

original: rgyu ma ni phra ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu ma ni phra ba'o //
translated: The intestines are slender.

original: khu ba 'dren par byed pas na rtsa'o //
analyzed: khu ba 'dren par byed pas na rtsa'o //
translated: The channels are so called because they draw out the juices.

original: ming du ma zhes bya ba ming mang po can dang / ming gi rnam pa du ma can no //
analyzed: ming du ma zhes bya ba ming mang po can dang / ming gi rnam pa du ma can no //
translated: ‚ÄúMany names‚Äù means many names and many forms of names.

original: ka dru ni tshon gyi bye brag go //
analyzed: ka dru ni tshon gyi bye brag go //
translated: Kardama is a particular type of dye.

original: khra bo ni bkra ba dang nye bar bkra ba'i bye brag go //
analyzed: khra bo ni bkra ba dang nye bar bkra ba'i bye brag go //
translated: Variegated means a particular type of colorful and variegated.

original: ba spu'i bu ga ni ba spu 'byung ba'i phyogs so //
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga ni ba spu 'byung ba'i phyogs so //
translated: The pores of the skin are the places where the hairs grow.

original: 'phel lo zhes bya ba ni mig gi rdul phra rab gnas gcig tu sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'phel lo zhes bya ba ni mig gi rdul phra rab gnas gcig tu sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt increases‚Äù means the atoms of the eye are gathered into one place.

original: rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni khyad par du thams cad sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni khyad par du thams cad sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes increase when it causes the collection of all the special qualities to increase.

original: rab tu 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni rang gi gnas su 'jog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni rang gi gnas su 'jog par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes to be placed when it causes to be placed in its own place.

original: kun du 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni mig gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi tshul du rnam par 'jog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni mig gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi tshul du rnam par 'jog par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes to be distributed when it causes to be distributed in the manner of the shape of the eyes, etc.

original: so sor 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni brtan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: so sor 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni brtan par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes to be fixed when it causes to be fixed firmly.

original: zas ni bza' bar bya ba'o //üîΩbtung ba ni btung bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: zas ni bza' bar bya ba'o // btung ba ni btung bar bya ba'o //
translated: Food is what is to be eaten.üîΩDrink is what is to be drunk.

original: bca' ba ni bca' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bca' ba ni bca' bar bya ba'o //
translated: Chew is what is to be chewed.

original: myang bar bya ba ni gzhib par bya ba'o //üîΩkun du dang par byed pa ni dri ma med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: myang bar bya ba ni gzhib par bya ba'o // kun du dang par byed pa ni dri ma med par byed pa'o //

original: so sor 'jog par byed pa ni dbyibs dri ma med pa skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: so sor 'jog par byed pa ni dbyibs dri ma med pa skyed par byed pa'o //

original: kun nas 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni rnyog pa med pa brtan pa nyid du byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'jog par byed ces bya ba ni rnyog pa med pa brtan pa nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: It causes to be placed when it causes to be placed firmly without disturbance.

original: sgrib par byed pas na thal ba'o //
analyzed: sgrib par byed pas na thal ba'o //
translated: It is ash because it covers.

original: gos kyi dum bu bsgril ba dang ldan pas na phyi ras so //
analyzed: gos kyi dum bu bsgril ba dang ldan pas na phyi ras so //
translated: It is a cloth because it is wrapped around a piece of cloth.

original: 'jim pa'i rang bzhin gyis gzugs can sgrub pa la mkhas pas na 'dra gzugs mkhan no //
analyzed: 'jim pa'i rang bzhin gyis gzugs can sgrub pa la mkhas pas na 'dra gzugs mkhan no //

original: dngos po 'di bdag gir gyur cig / gzhan gyir ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni ser sna yin la /
analyzed: dngos po 'di bdag gir gyur cig / gzhan gyir ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni ser sna yin la /
translated: Avarice is the desire to possess something, thinking, ‚ÄúMay this thing be mine and not another‚Äôs.‚Äù

original: de'i dngos po ni ser sna nyid @51b de ;
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni ser sna nyid @51b de ;
translated: The nature of that is avarice itself.

original: de nyid dri ma yin la kun nas dkris pa des khyab pas so //
analyzed: de nyid dri ma yin la kun nas dkris pa des khyab pas so //
translated: It is a stain because it is a defilement that pervades the mind with that.

original: sbyin pas gnas sdud par byed cing gtong ba nyid du mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de la gya gyus sdud pa zhes bya bar tha snyad du gdags pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pas gnas sdud par byed cing gtong ba nyid du mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de la gya gyus sdud pa zhes bya bar tha snyad du gdags pa yin no //
translated: It is called ‚Äúdeception‚Äù because it is a means of attracting and keeping people by giving them things, but not out of a desire to give.üîΩIt is called ‚Äúpresent‚Äù because it is ready to produce its result.

original: de mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa 'byin pa'i phyir /üîΩrung ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa 'byin pa'i phyir / rung ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúsuitable‚Äù because it is ready to produce its result.

original: lhan cig ces bya ba ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig ces bya ba ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTogether‚Äù means ‚Äúin association.‚Äù

original: mang du zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: mang du zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMany‚Äù means ‚Äúabundant.‚Äù

original: sgrin pa ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sgrin pa ni gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSkillful‚Äù means ‚Äúclear.‚Äù

original: na ba nyams pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i nus pa nyams par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: na ba nyams pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i nus pa nyams par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIllness and decline‚Äù means the decline of the ability to study.

original: sor mo yongs su bcad pas stong pas na lag pa 'byar ba'o //
analyzed: sor mo yongs su bcad pas stong pas na lag pa 'byar ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHand-like‚Äù means empty of fingers.

original: dor ba'i chos can zhes bya ba ni skye bo thams cad la yongs su spang ba'i blo skyed par byed pa can no //
analyzed: dor ba'i chos can zhes bya ba ni skye bo thams cad la yongs su spang ba'i blo skyed par byed pa can no //

original: shes par ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khong du chud par ma gyur pa'o //üîΩgzugs bzang po zhes bya ba ni kha dog gi sgo nas so /üîΩblta na sdug pa zhes bya ba ni dbyibs kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: shes par ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khong du chud par ma gyur pa'o // gzugs bzang po zhes bya ba ni kha dog gi sgo nas so / blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba ni dbyibs kyi sgo nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot understood‚Äù means not comprehended.üîΩ‚ÄúGood-looking‚Äù means in terms of color.üîΩ‚ÄúBeautiful‚Äù means in terms of shape.

original: mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni mdangs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir mdzes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni mdangs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir mdzes par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: rgyab kyi tshigs par mdun gyis bltas pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du phyogs par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: ma zhu ba'i gnas kyis khyab par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnon par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: zhu ba'i gnas kyis phug par gyur pa na zhes bya ba ni steng du 'jog pa'o //

original: bcing ba lngas bcings pa zhes bya ba ni phur pa lngas rnam par rko ba'i tshul du brkos shing lag pa dang rkang pa dang mgo bo de dag so sor tha dad pa bcom pa gang yin pa de ni bcing ba lnga po des bcings pa bzhin dang
analyzed: bcing ba lngas bcings pa zhes bya ba ni phur pa lngas rnam par rko ba'i tshul du brkos shing lag pa dang rkang pa dang mgo bo de dag so sor tha dad pa bcom pa gang yin pa de ni bcing ba lnga po des bcings pa bzhin dang
translated: He is like one bound by the five bonds,

original: / gsal shing la bskyon pa nyid du gnas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: / gsal shing la bskyon pa nyid du gnas par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: mngal rnam par gnod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gdung bar byed pa'o // rgyug pa ni myur du 'gro bar byed pa'o //

original: mgyogs pa ni shin tu shugs kyis 'gro bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mgyogs pa ni shin tu shugs kyis 'gro bar byed pa'o //

original: rgal ba ni gyur ba la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: rgal ba ni gyur ba la sogs pa las so //

original: mchong ba ni steng du mchong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mchong ba ni steng du mchong bar byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLeaping‚Äù means leaping up.

original: mi mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo ;
analyzed: mi mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo ;

analyzed: / shin tu che ba nyid yin pa'i phyir mi bzad pa'o //

analyzed: thog mar brnag par dka' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rtsub pa'o //

analyzed: tha mar bzod par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir tsha ba'o // dran pa'i shes pas yul du byas pa na yang yid mi bde ba nyid kyi phyir yid du mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: It is hot because it is difficult to bear at the end.

original: 'du shes @52a * //
analyzed: 'du shes @52a * //
translated: It is unpleasant because it is disagreeable when it is made an object of consciousness through memory.üîΩThe eight perceptions are:

analyzed: brgyad thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni mngal la khyim la sogs pa'i 'du shes so //

original: nag po zhes bya ba ni spyi tsam yin la /
analyzed: nag po zhes bya ba ni spyi tsam yin la /
translated: Black is a general term,

analyzed: phyogs gcig ngag pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir kha dog nag po zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //

analyzed: nag por snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'od nag po'o //

original: rtsa ng'ur ba'i myu gu'i mdangs kyi mdog lta bu zhes bya ba ni dmar por snang zhing dkar po'i mdangs kyi mdog can no //
analyzed: rtsa ng'ur ba'i myu gu'i mdangs kyi mdog lta bu zhes bya ba ni dmar por snang zhing dkar po'i mdangs kyi mdog can no //
translated: The color of the sprouts of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ means it appears red and has the color of the radiance of white.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba'i phyir spro ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba'i phyir spro ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Desire means being full of enthusiasm because of the arising.

original: phyin ci ma log pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i don no //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i don no //
translated: Non-mistaken means the meaning of truth.

original: rkang pa log pa zhes bya ba ni rkang pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa 'am rkang pa yo bar gyur pa'o /üîΩ// / bam po drug pa /
analyzed: rkang pa log pa zhes bya ba ni rkang pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa 'am rkang pa yo bar gyur pa'o / // / bam po drug pa /
translated: The legs are crooked means the legs are twisted or the legs are crooked.

analyzed: de shes pa'i bud med ces bya ba ni las de la bzo ba'o //
translated: The woman who knows that means she is skilled in that action.

analyzed: gzhon nu'i gso ba shes pa zhes bya ba ni gzhon nu'i gso ba'i rgyud la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who knows the care of a youth means she is skilled in the tantra of caring for a youth.

original: de bshad khang dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bshad khang dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The one who is like a lecture hall and so on.

original: dri mi zhim pa dang / mun pa gnag pa dang / 'dzings pa'i 'dam ni dri mi zhim pa mun pa gnag pa 'dzings pa'i 'dam mo //
analyzed: dri mi zhim pa dang / mun pa gnag pa dang / 'dzings pa'i 'dam ni dri mi zhim pa mun pa gnag pa 'dzings pa'i 'dam mo //
translated: The mud of bad smell, darkness, and entanglement means bad smell, darkness, and entanglement.

original: srin bu mang po'i rigs stong phrag man po dag ni srin bu'i rigs stong ste /
analyzed: srin bu mang po'i rigs stong phrag man po dag ni srin bu'i rigs stong ste /
translated: There are many kinds of worms, and there are thousands of kinds of worms.

original: de dag gi gnas de la'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gnas de la'o //
translated: They are in the place where those worms are.

original: sa bon dang khrag dang dri ma dang khrag rlang ni sa bon dang khrag dang dri ma dang khrag rlang rnams te /
analyzed: sa bon dang khrag dang dri ma dang khrag rlang ni sa bon dang khrag dang dri ma dang khrag rlang rnams te /
translated: Seeds, blood, impurities, and blood-bile are seeds, blood, impurities, and blood-bile.

original: sa bon dang khrag dang dri ma dang khrag rlang de dag gis kun nas te shin tu rnam par rul zhing kun nas rul pa ste rnag tu gyur cing zags par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon dang khrag dang dri ma dang khrag rlang de dag gis kun nas te shin tu rnam par rul zhing kun nas rul pa ste rnag tu gyur cing zags par gyur pa'o //
translated: Those seeds, blood, impurities, and blood-bile are all around, completely rotten, completely putrid, become pus, and become oozing.

original: lus kyi bu gu'i rma zhes bya ba ni phyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi bu gu'i rma zhes bya ba ni phyis bshad pa'o //
translated: The wound of the body's openings is explained later.

original: bdag nyid rma sar ba lta bu zhes bya ba ni rma sar pa dang 'dra bar bdag nyid spyod pas rma sar pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid rma sar ba lta bu zhes bya ba ni rma sar pa dang 'dra bar bdag nyid spyod pas rma sar pa lta bu ste /
translated: One's own body is like an open wound means that one's own body is like an open wound, like an open wound.

analyzed: bdag nyid rma sar pa lta bur spyad pa gang la yod pa de ni 'dir bdag nyi rma sar pa lta bu'i rnam par gyur pa'o //
translated: One who has practiced one's own body as if it were an open wound, that is the one who has become like an open wound here.

original: bdag nyid mtshon ma yin pa la mtshon ltar spyod pa ni mtshon lta bu dang / de bzhin du 'gyur byed lta bu ni mtshon lta bu dang / 'gyur byed lta bu ste lag pa'i reg pa nyid ni de la 'dir mtshon cha dang 'gyur byed lta bu'i reg pa ni lag pa dag gis bzung ba na'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid mtshon ma yin pa la mtshon ltar spyod pa ni mtshon lta bu dang / de bzhin du 'gyur byed lta bu ni mtshon lta bu dang / 'gyur byed lta bu ste lag pa'i reg pa nyid ni de la 'dir mtshon cha dang 'gyur byed lta bu'i reg pa ni lag pa dag gis bzung ba na'o //
translated: The body is like a weapon and a saw, in that one grasps it with one's hands.üîΩImmediately after birth, it has two names:

original: skyes ma thag tu de la ming gnyis su 'gyur te @52b zhes bya ba ni bdag khye'u 'am bu mor shes par 'gyur ba'o //üîΩshing le ba ni spang leb kyi rnam pa'o //üîΩrtsva ba ting ba ni rtsva'i tshogs so //
analyzed: skyes ma thag tu de la ming gnyis su 'gyur te @52b zhes bya ba ni bdag khye'u 'am bu mor shes par 'gyur ba'o // shing le ba ni spang leb kyi rnam pa'o // rtsva ba ting ba ni rtsva'i tshogs so //
translated: The body is like a log, in that it is a log.üîΩThe body is like a clump of grass, in that it is a clump of grass.

original: lus tshos pa ni kun nas rnag 'dzag pas gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lus tshos pa ni kun nas rnag 'dzag pas gyur pa'o //
translated: The body is like a burning coal, in that it is covered with oozing pus.üîΩThus, the body is like a pit of excrement, in that it is a pit of excrement.

original: de ltar skyes pa zhes bya ba ni nur nur po'i gnas skabs thob pa 'di nyid yis bstan pa yin no//
analyzed: de ltar skyes pa zhes bya ba ni nur nur po'i gnas skabs thob pa 'di nyid yis bstan pa yin no//
translated: This is taught by the word thus.

original: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mer po dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor po dang / rkang lag 'gyur pa'i gnas skabs thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mer po dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor po dang / rkang lag 'gyur pa'i gnas skabs thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEmerges‚Äù means that the embryo reaches the stage of the oval, the oblong, the globular, and the stage of the limbs and digits.

original: mngon par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni srid pa snga ma'i dus yi nas skabs thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni srid pa snga ma'i dus yi nas skabs thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIs formed‚Äù means that it reaches the stage of the prior existence.

original: skyed pa ni 'o ma bsnun pas so //
analyzed: skyed pa ni 'o ma bsnun pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIs born‚Äù means that it is nourished by the mother‚Äôs milk.

original: gso ba ni bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gso ba ni bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIs nurtured‚Äù means that it is nourished by food and drink.

original: bsrings pa ni phyi rol gyi gnod pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: bsrings pa ni phyi rol gyi gnod pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIs raised‚Äù means that it is protected from external harm.

original: snying gi phyogs na gnas pa mchin pa lta bu'i sha'i bye brag la sha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: snying gi phyogs na gnas pa mchin pa lta bu'i sha'i bye brag la sha zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFlesh‚Äù is a particular kind of flesh that is located in the region of the heart and resembles a liver.

original: gdungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kun nas gdungs pa chung ngu la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: gdungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kun nas gdungs pa chung ngu la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIs heated‚Äù and so on means that it experiences the lesser and greater stages of heating.

original: so sor myong ngo zhes bya ba ni khyad par du myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: so sor myong ngo zhes bya ba ni khyad par du myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIs felt‚Äù means that it experiences the special stages of heating.

original: snyom pa ni lus kyi zug gzer ro //
analyzed: snyom pa ni lus kyi zug gzer ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIs pained‚Äù means that it experiences bodily pain.

original: lha'i gdon la sogs pa ni gdon gyi rnam pa kun nas lha'i gdon kho na ste /
analyzed: lha'i gdon la sogs pa ni gdon gyi rnam pa kun nas lha'i gdon kho na ste /
translated: The divine type of spirit and so on are all types of spirits that are only divine spirits.

original: sa bla la spyod pa'i lha rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bla la spyod pa'i lha rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'o //
translated: The four great kings and so on are gods who live above the earth.

original: 'chi med kyi gdon ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi lha'o //
analyzed: 'chi med kyi gdon ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi lha'o //
translated: The immortal spirit is a magical god.

original: dri za la sogs pa ni yi dags mthu che ba'o //
analyzed: dri za la sogs pa ni yi dags mthu che ba'o //
translated: The gandharva and so on are powerful hungry ghosts.

original: mi 'am ci'i gdon ni dud 'gro'o //
analyzed: mi 'am ci'i gdon ni dud 'gro'o //
translated: The kinnara spirit is an animal.

original: lto 'phye chen po'i gdon ni 'jog pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po'i gdon ni 'jog pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mahoraga spirit is a naga and so on.

original: gnod sbyin gyi gdon ni lha rten gyi mchod pa'i gtor ma len pa'o //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi gdon ni lha rten gyi mchod pa'i gtor ma len pa'o //
translated: The yaksha spirit is one who takes the bali offering of a shrine.

original: srin po ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs can tu dman pa'o //
analyzed: srin po ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs can tu dman pa'o //
translated: The rakshasa is a type of yaksha who is inferior.

original: yi dags ni yid dags su skyes pa'i shin tu ltogs pa'o //
analyzed: yi dags ni yid dags su skyes pa'i shin tu ltogs pa'o //
translated: The hungry ghost is a hungry ghost who is born hungry.

original: 'dre ni yi dags sha za ba'o //
analyzed: 'dre ni yi dags sha za ba'o //
translated: The ghost is a hungry ghost who eats flesh.

original: 'byung po ni gzugs su snang ba mdangs 'phrog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung po ni gzugs su snang ba mdangs 'phrog par byed pa'o //
translated: The bhutas are those who appear in form and steal radiance.

original: grul bum dang srul po la sog pa ni tshad chung ba dri za la sogs pa las khyad par du gyur pa can yi dags kho na'o //
analyzed: grul bum dang srul po la sog pa ni tshad chung ba dri za la sogs pa las khyad par du gyur pa can yi dags kho na'o //
translated: The kumbhanda, putana and so on are hungry ghosts who are smaller than the gandharva and so on and have special features.

original: skyems byed ni lus skems par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyems byed ni lus skems par byed pa'o //
translated: The thirst-inducing spirit is one that causes the body to become parched.

original: smyo byed kyi gdon ni zin pa'i dus su gang gis smyo bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: smyo byed kyi gdon ni zin pa'i dus su gang gis smyo bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The insanity-inducing spirit is one that causes insanity when it seizes a person.

original: bya'i gdon ni bya'i gzugs can te dud 'gro'i rigs so //
analyzed: bya'i gdon ni bya'i gzugs can te dud 'gro'i rigs so //
translated: The bird spirit is one that has the form of a bird; it is a type of animal.

original: yang dag par bde ba la gnas na zhes bya ba ni yongs su skyong bar gyur pa na'o //üîΩmya ngan ni sdug pa dang bral ba las skyes pa'i @53a * //
analyzed: yang dag par bde ba la gnas na zhes bya ba ni yongs su skyong bar gyur pa na'o // mya ngan ni sdug pa dang bral ba las skyes pa'i @53a * //
translated: When one is dwelling in perfect happiness, that is, when one is protected.

original: yid kyi gdung ba'o //
analyzed: yid kyi gdung ba'o //
translated: Sorrow is a mental anguish that arises from being separated from what one holds dear.

original: smre sngags 'don pa ni byas pa de nyid ngag tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: smre sngags 'don pa ni byas pa de nyid ngag tu brjod pa'o //
translated: Lamentation is the verbal expression of that very separation.

original: sdug bsngal ni lus kyi'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni lus kyi'o //
translated: Suffering is physical.

original: yid mi bde ba ni yid kyi sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: yid mi bde ba ni yid kyi sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Depression is mental suffering.

original: 'khrug pa ni sdug ba dang bral ba'i rgyu can gyi lus gdung ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrug pa ni sdug ba dang bral ba'i rgyu can gyi lus gdung ba'o //
translated: Agitation is the torment of the body that is caused by separation from what is dear.

original: sdug bsngal dag las tha dad par bya ba dka' ba nyid kyi phyir gnod pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dag las tha dad par bya ba dka' ba nyid kyi phyir gnod pa'o //
translated: Since it is difficult to distinguish it from the other sufferings, it is called distress.

original: dus nyung ngur gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir nyung ba'o //
analyzed: dus nyung ngur gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir nyung ba'o //
translated: Since it lasts only a short time, it is called a little.

original: rnam par 'tshe ba du ma blangs pa nyid kyi phyir sdug bsngal ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam par 'tshe ba du ma blangs pa nyid kyi phyir sdug bsngal ba yin la /
translated: It is suffering because it is the taking up of many kinds of violence.

original: ldan pa ni skye ba'i 'dug bsngal la sos pa dang / 'gro ba 'pho ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni skye ba'i 'dug bsngal la sos pa dang / 'gro ba 'pho ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du'o //
translated: The suffering of birth is the suffering of the world of sentient beings. The suffering of change is in the world beyond.

original: byos shig pa ni yang dag par bsgrub par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: byos shig pa ni yang dag par bsgrub par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Do it means accomplish it.

original: spro ba chung ba ni 'bad rtsol chung ba'o //
analyzed: spro ba chung ba ni 'bad rtsol chung ba'o //
translated: Little enthusiasm means little effort.

original: don spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: don spyod pa zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The practice of the meaning is the accomplishment of one's own and others' goals.

original: dge ba spyod pa ni lus la sogs pa dge ba la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba spyod pa ni lus la sogs pa dge ba la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The practice of virtue is engaging in virtuous actions of body and so on.

original: sdug ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod par bya ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir sdug pa'o //
analyzed: sdug ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod par bya ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir sdug pa'o //
translated: Regarding the phrase beautiful and so on, it is beautiful because it is an object of desire.

original: 'dod par bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod par bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is desirable because it has the nature of being desirable.

original: dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir mdza' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir mdza' ba'o //
translated: It is dear because it is the cause of delight.

original: skad cig kyang yid kyis yongs su dor ba med pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig kyang yid kyis yongs su dor ba med pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba'o //
translated: It is pleasing because it is not abandoned by the mind even for a moment.

original: de dag dang lhan cig yul gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir bral ba ni sna sogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag dang lhan cig yul gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir bral ba ni sna sogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The separation of the nose, etc. is the separation of the nose, etc. from the body, because they move to another place together with it.

original: 'chi ba'i phyir bral ba ni rnam par med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i phyir bral ba ni rnam par med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The separation of death is the separation of the body from the life faculty.

original: shin tu bskal ba'i rgyu can gyi khams gzhan du skyes pa'i phyir bral ba ni bral ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu bskal ba'i rgyu can gyi khams gzhan du skyes pa'i phyir bral ba ni bral ba'o //
translated: The separation of birth is the separation of the body from the womb, the egg, the membrane, or the placenta.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir bral ba ni rnam par bral ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir bral ba ni rnam par bral ba'o //
translated: The separation of nirvana is the separation of the body from the passions.

original: bya ba thams cad la nus pa med pa'i phyir nyam chung ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad la nus pa med pa'i phyir nyam chung ba'o //
translated: The separation of weakness is the separation of the body from strength, because it is incapable of any action.

original: dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: The separation of analysis is the separation of the body from the mind of emanation, because it is by nature analytical.

original: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir mtshams las ma rgal ba yin te /
analyzed: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir mtshams las ma rgal ba yin te /
translated: The separation of the boundary is the separation of the body from the boundary of life, because it is firm.

original: bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa'i phyir gzhung la tshul bzhin thob pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa'i phyir gzhung la tshul bzhin thob pa'o //
translated: The separation of the scriptures is the separation of the body from the scriptures, because it does not perform its function.

original: dgu bcu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal tshab lta bu'o //
analyzed: dgu bcu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal tshab lta bu'o //
translated: The separation of the regent is the separation of the body from the state of a regent, because it is the state of the ninety-first existence.

original: rgas thub pa zhes bya ba ni myur du 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: rgas thub pa zhes bya ba ni myur du 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: The separation of old age is the separation of the body from old age, because it is the state of one who quickly goes to death.

original: 'chi ba'i chos ni chos can no //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i chos ni chos can no //
translated: The Dharma of death is the subject.

original: so sor yid brtan du med pa'i phyir yid mi brtan pa'o //
analyzed: so sor yid brtan du med pa'i phyir yid mi brtan pa'o //
translated: It is unreliable because it is not to be trusted.

original: gdos ni rab tu grags pa ste bcing pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gdos ni rab tu grags pa ste bcing pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: A fetter is well known as a means of binding.

original: lcags ni rtag lcags so //
analyzed: lcags ni rtag lcags so //
translated: Iron is a kind of metal.

original: stong ni ske ba nas bcing @53b ba'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: stong ni ske ba nas bcing @53b ba'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: A chain is a means of binding the neck.

original: lag lcags ni shing las byas pa lag pa gnyis bcing ba'i thabs su gyur ba'o //
analyzed: lag lcags ni shing las byas pa lag pa gnyis bcing ba'i thabs su gyur ba'o //
translated: Handcuffs are a means of binding the two hands, made of wood.

original: 'ching ba lnga ni lag pa la sogs pa so sor phur ba dag la btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'ching ba lnga ni lag pa la sogs pa so sor phur ba dag la btags pa'o //
translated: The five fetters are stakes driven into the individual parts, such as the hands.

original: re lde la sogs pa reg bya rtsub pa can gyis dkris shing mnyes pa ni re lde'i nang du bsgril ba'o //
analyzed: re lde la sogs pa reg bya rtsub pa can gyis dkris shing mnyes pa ni re lde'i nang du bsgril ba'o //
translated: Being bound with a rope, etc., which is rough to the touch, is being bound with a rope.

original: gsal shing la bskyon pa ni gsal shing gis phug pa'o //
analyzed: gsal shing la bskyon pa ni gsal shing gis phug pa'o //
translated: Being impaled is being pierced with a stake.

original: shing gi rtsang btsugs pa ni gzhan gdung bar byed pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: shing gi rtsang btsugs pa ni gzhan gdung bar byed pa'i bye brag go //
translated: Being tied to a wooden frame is a particular kind of torture.

original: brdeg pa ni nye bar 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: brdeg pa ni nye bar 'tsho ba'o //
translated: Beating is a kind of violence.

original: sha sprang ni sbran bu gdug pa can te /
analyzed: sha sprang ni sbran bu gdug pa can te /
translated: A flesh-eating demon is a kind of evil spirit.

original: gang ba lang la sos pa dag la 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang ba lang la sos pa dag la 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the grasping of the cowherd in regard to the cows.

original: sbrul ni sdig sbrul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul ni sdig sbrul la sogs pa'o //
translated: The snake is the cobra, etc.

original: yongs su tshol ba'i rtsa bas zhes bya ba ni phan par byed pa'i yongs su tshol ba'i byed rgyu dag gis so //
analyzed: yongs su tshol ba'i rtsa bas zhes bya ba ni phan par byed pa'i yongs su tshol ba'i byed rgyu dag gis so //
translated: By the root of investigation means by the cause of the investigation that is beneficial.

original: 'du byed kyi rgyun ni 'du byed kyi rgyud yin la /üîΩde'i mtshams sbyor ba ni mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rgyun ni 'du byed kyi rgyud yin la / de'i mtshams sbyor ba ni mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ste /
translated: The stream of formations is the stream of formations.üîΩIts connection is the connection that connects,

original: kun du 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: kun du 'brel ba'o //
translated: the connection that is related.

original: skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
translated: It is impermanent because it is momentary.

original: rgyun rgyud chad pa'i phyir mi brtan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun rgyud chad pa'i phyir mi brtan pa'o //
translated: It is unstable because the stream is interrupted.

original: zla ba'i dang lo'i bar du gnas par nges pa'i yid brtan du med pa'i phyir brtan du mi rung ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i dang lo'i bar du gnas par nges pa'i yid brtan du med pa'i phyir brtan du mi rung ba'o //
translated: It is unreliable because it is not certain to remain for the duration of a month or a year.

original: skad cig skad cig la rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gyur ba'i chos can no //
analyzed: skad cig skad cig la rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gyur ba'i chos can no //
translated: It is subject to change because it changes into other and other aspects from moment to moment.

original: 'dus byas thams cad la skyo bar bya ba shin tu legs par rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad la skyo bar bya ba shin tu legs par rig pa'o //
translated: It is to be fully understood as a cause of weariness with all conditioned things.

original: mi 'chags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs par gyur pa rgyun gcod pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: mi 'chags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs par gyur pa rgyun gcod pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The phrase that which is not to be confessed refers to the fact that the stream of afflictions is severed.

original: rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par bral ba thob pa skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par bral ba thob pa skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The phrase that which is liberation refers to the fact that it generates the attainment of freedom from bondage.

original: rnam par slu ba zhes bya ba ni slu bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par slu ba zhes bya ba ni slu bar byed pa ste /
translated: The phrase that which is a deception refers to the fact that it is a deception.

original: bde ba nyams su myong ba mngon par 'dod pa sngon du song ba can gyi sdug bsngal so sor thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bde ba nyams su myong ba mngon par 'dod pa sngon du song ba can gyi sdug bsngal so sor thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The phrase that which is the attainment of suffering refers to the fact that it is preceded by the desire to experience pleasure.

original: so so'i skye bo kho na mtshungs pa'i phyir so so'i skye bor gyur pa'o //üîΩrang bzhin te ngo bo nyid kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'breng ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo kho na mtshungs pa'i phyir so so'i skye bor gyur pa'o // rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'breng ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase that which is an ordinary person means that it is an ordinary person because it is similar to the state of an ordinary person.üîΩThe phrase that which is one who naturally possesses morality means that it is one who naturally possesses morality because he or she is naturally endowed with morality and does not rely upon others.

original: dge ba ste kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos gang la yod pa de ni dge ba'i chos can te /
analyzed: dge ba ste kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos gang la yod pa de ni dge ba'i chos can te /
translated: The phrase that which is one who possesses virtuous qualities means that it is one who possesses virtuous qualities because it is endowed with virtuous qualities that are free of evil.

original: nyi ma re re zhing yon tan mngon par 'phel zhing rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩdge ba'i dngos po la 'dun cing mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba la @54a * //
analyzed: nyi ma re re zhing yon tan mngon par 'phel zhing rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // dge ba'i dngos po la 'dun cing mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba la @54a * //
translated: It means that every day the qualities become more and more manifest and grow.üîΩThe aspiration for virtue is the aspiration for the wholesome.

original: 'dun pa'o // mtshungs par spyod par byed pas na mtshungs par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dun pa'o // mtshungs par spyod par byed pas na mtshungs par spyod pa ste /
translated: The practice of virtue is the practice of the wholesome.

original: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi lus ngag gi bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi lus ngag gi bya ba'o //
translated: The practice of virtue is the bodily and vocal action which is the sign of pure morality.

original: sdom pa mang po can zhes bya ba ni kha na mtho ba byas pa la bshags pa la sogs pas phyir gso bar byed pa mang ba'o //
analyzed: sdom pa mang po can zhes bya ba ni kha na mtho ba byas pa la bshags pa la sogs pas phyir gso bar byed pa mang ba'o //
translated: The one who has many vows is the one who has many vows of confession, etc.

original: so sor rtog pa mang po can zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims sel bar byed pa mang po'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa mang po can zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims sel bar byed pa mang po'o //
translated: The one who has many investigations is the one who has many investigations of the obstacles to morality and the means of removing them.

original: skye ba gnyis dan gsum thogs pa ni rigs nas rigs su skye bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba gnyis dan gsum thogs pa ni rigs nas rigs su skye bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The one who is reborn in two or three families should be understood as the one who is reborn in the same family.

original: skye ba gcig gi lhag ma yod pas na /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gi lhag ma yod pas na /
translated: The one who has one birth remaining is the one who has one birth remaining.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste /
translated: He is obstructed by only one birth.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o //
translated: He is a once-returner.

original: las bdag gir byed pa zhes bya ba ni las kyi bran du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: las bdag gir byed pa zhes bya ba ni las kyi bran du gyur pa'o //
translated: He is a slave of karma, because he is a slave of his karma.

original: las las skyes pa zhes bya ba ni las las byung bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: las las skyes pa zhes bya ba ni las las byung bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: He is born from karma, because he is produced from karma.

original: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bya ba ni las las thob pa'i 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bya ba ni las las thob pa'i 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: He enjoys the inheritance of karma, because he enjoys the fruit obtained from karma.

original: las la brten pa zhes bya ba ni las las yongs su thob pa'o //
analyzed: las la brten pa zhes bya ba ni las las yongs su thob pa'o //
translated: He is based on karma, because he is obtained from karma.

original: shes te zhes bya ba ni bya ba thams cad sems la ltos par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: shes te zhes bya ba ni bya ba thams cad sems la ltos par gyur pa'o //
translated: He knows, because all actions depend on the mind.

original: rten cing 'brel par byung ba zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi skad cig re re la brten cing ltos nas byung ba ste /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par byung ba zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi skad cig re re la brten cing ltos nas byung ba ste /
translated: He is dependently arisen, because he arises in dependence on the momentary conditions.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i mngal gyi gnas su 'jug cing gnas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i mngal gyi gnas su 'jug cing gnas par gyur pa'o //
translated: He enters the womb and abides there in this way.

original: gnas kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gnas kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of his abode?

original: las bdag gir byed pa dang / las las skyes pa zhes bya ba nas khrag dang tshil gyis bkang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa yin te /
analyzed: las bdag gir byed pa dang / las las skyes pa zhes bya ba nas khrag dang tshil gyis bkang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa yin te /
translated: The phrase the domain of the demon refers to the fact that the body is the domain of the demon.

original: bdud kyi dbang zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi dbang zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase the demon's domain means that the demon has power over the body.üîΩThe demon has power over the body in the sense that it is the object of the demon's control.

original: bdud ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdag po'i yul du gyur pa yin pa de'i phyir lus la bdud kyi snod ces bya'o //
analyzed: bdud ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdag po'i yul du gyur pa yin pa de'i phyir lus la bdud kyi snod ces bya'o //
